inStockText: Only 4 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Exercise Bikes
features: 【Heavy-Duty 49 LB Flywheel】This exercise bike is equipped with a 49 lbs heavy-duty flywheel that delivers a natural, smooth, and consistent cycling workout
【Authentic Experience】Micro-adjustable leather resistance that simulates real road biking, giving you an immersive and authentic riding experience at home
【Ergonomic Design】High-quality non-slip handlebar and micro-adjustable leather resistance deliver a comfortable and authentic workout experience at home, reducing fatigue during extended sessions
【Quiet Operation】Features a belt drive system for a quieter and smoother workout, allowing you to focus on your exercise without any distracting noise
【Customizable Comfort】Offers a 4-way adjustable seat and a 2-way adjustable handlebar to tailor the workout to your specific needs and preferences
【Superior Capacity】With a strong and durable heavy-duty frame, this stationary bike can accommodate a maximum user weight of up to 275 lbs
【Secure Ride】Comes with caged pedals for enhanced security and safety stop feature to quickly halt the spinning motion
【Easy Assembly】The average installation time is just 30 minutes, getting you up and running quickly and effortlessly
【Portable and Convenient】High-quality transportation wheels make it easy to move and store when not in use. Comes with a water bottle holder for easy hydration access during workouts

【Proven Quality】This exercise bike is a product of Sunny Health & Fitness, a trusted brand with over 20 years of experience in the fitness equipment industry. You can trust in the durability, reliability, and efficiency of this stationary bike

items.text:
49 LB FLYWHEEL
The SF-B1002 is engineered with one of the heaviest flywheels available for a consumer indoor cycle bike. Feel the burn from those intense climbs or get your heart pumping on those sprints.

MICRO ADJUSTABLE LEATHER RESISTANCE
Switch up the resistance of your SF-B1002 Belt Drive Indoor Cycling Bike with the convenient tension knob. Adjust the resistance to add variety to your biking sessions.

ADJUSTABLE COMFORT
The seat can be adjusted for height and proximity to handlebars for setting up your cycle bike, sizing, and fitting. The recommended height range is 5'2 to 6'1.

BOTTLE HOLDER
Stay hydrated in the most demanding of workouts. The convenient bottle holder keeps your favorite refreshing beverage within arm’s reach!

MULTI-GRIP & NON-SLIP HANDLEBARS
Multi-grip ergonomic handlebar designed for all types of hand and grip positions for maximum comfort.

TRANSPORTATION WHEELS
Simply tilt and roll out for use or away for storage, no need for heavy lifting or muscle strain. The wheels at the front of the unit allow the user to move their equipment around with ease.

title: Stationary Bike Cover，Upright Exercise Bike Cover Waterproof Outdoor with Air Vent,Waterproof Strip,4 Windproof Buckles,All Weather Large Cover for Exercise Bike,Suitable for Peloton Bike+ and Schwinn
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Sports › Cycling › Accessories › Bike Covers
features: Durable Material:Stationary bike cover is made of extra thick 420D oxford fabric with nano material triple coating inside,so the inner layer is extra smooth,soft and won't scratch your exercise bike.SPF＞75+.Waterproof strips are added at the seams and with double-stitched seams,it can withstand up to 8000MM water pressure and protect your stationary bike for indoor or outdoor storage from rain, UV radiation, dust, scratches,rips,bird droppings, fallen leaves and etc.

All-round Protection For Exercise Bike:4 Adjustable and elastic fixed windproof buckles (2 in the front and 2 in the back),the exercise bike cover waterproof outdoor can be tightly fixed on your peloton bike even in stormy weather, making your exercise bike safe, reliable and dry.A exercise bike cover waterproof outdoor that truly resist the wind, rain, sun and snow.

2 Details You'll Love:①Air Vent On the Right Side:Keep the air circulation inside the stationary bike cover outdoor to prevent frost and keeps seats dry.②2 Reflective Handles：You also can clearly see the location of the stationary bike indoor in the evening and prevent collision.The cover for exercise bike has 2 handles，make removing the indoor exercisebike cover in a breeze.

Universal Fit:SIZE:60"D x 24"W x 60"H.Our peloton bike cover outdoor are universal fit and suitable for gym bikes of different styles and brands.Exercise bike weatherproof cover fits the dimensions of the peloton Bike, Bike+ as well as other stationary and recumbent bikes and kids bikes.We recommend that please measure carefully before buying your stationary exercise bike dimensions, including the longest /highest /widest.

60 Days Replacement Service：In addition to receiving a large stationary bike cover you will also have an extra portable storage bag for easy storage and portability.We have a 60 days replacement service.If you have any questions, please email us.NOTE:Do not install sharp ornaments on the upright indoor cycling, or it will damage the indoor cycling protective cover.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Engineered in Canada to be smooth, foldable... and so comfortable you could sit on it all day. 
Track your usage data and out put on your bike 
Quiet enough to use in group office settings or during calls. 
Stay Active and Motivated at Home or at Work 
Looking for focus, energy, and fitness? Use the Ergonomyx under-desk bike to get an at-home workout or burn calories with light exercise throughout your day. 
Change your day, then change your life. 
Sitting at a desk all day can have profound effects on mental and physical health. Studies show that physical movement is the ideal solution: it releases endorphins that keep you happy, motivated, and healthy. 
The best-built under-desk bike on the market. 
Unlike many at-home fitness machines, the Ergonomyx Under-Desk Bike is built from high-quality components. The result is a bike that's quiet, comfortable, and ingeniously folds for storage. 
Unlock a new level of health and productivity. 
With the Ergonomyx Under-Desk Bike, your work and fitness goals become as easy as, well... riding a bike! Burn calories while you work and push your limits with challenges built into the app.

features: 【15.6" HD TOUCHSCREEN】Artist-generated interactive 3D stages turn every room into an immersive workout via our 15.6" HD touchscreen.
【ROTATE FOR MORE】Rotate the screen to seamlessly transition between a staggering array of cycling, stretching, strength training, and more classes all under one roof.
【AUTO RESISTANCE SYSTEM】Auto-adjusts based on the instructor's cue and adapts to each unique riding style.
【SMART SADDLE DETECTION+】Detects in and out of saddle riding via sensors to deliver intense and fulfilling results.
【PERSONAL TRAINER ALGORITHM】Evaluates each rider's performance and applies the perfect balance of a challenging yet fun intensity to push every rider at the right speed, level, and time.

【VALUE-PACKED MEMBERSHIP】 All-Access Membership must be purchased separately in order to access content on your Bike. You’ll pay $39/mo for your entire household and get unlimited access to our entire library of content available on your Bike, Your account can be activated during Bike setup

【VARIETY OF CLASSES】Explore thousands of classes across 10+ disciplines that go beyond cycling—from strength and yoga to meditation and more. Try outdoor classes , boxing, or a gamified cycling experience with Freebeat Lanebreak. All-Access Membership separate.

title: Goplus Exercise Bike, Magnetic Resistance Stationary Bike with Built-in Safe Flywheel, Comfortable Seat Cushion, LCD Monitor, Phone Holder, Belt Drive Indoor Cycling Bike for Home Gym Cardio Workout
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Exercise Bikes
features: 【Smooth Ride & Limitless Magnetic Resistance】 Unlike traditional exercise bikes, our magnetic resistance exercise bike with quiet belt-driven system keeps your indoor cycling smooth and silent without disturbing others. With limitless magnetic resistance design, you can adjust tension level by turning the resistance button to customize your workout plans according to your fitness level.

【Safe is The First】 Our exercise bike with an all-inclusive protection cover improves safety. In any emergency, you can press the resistance button for emergency braking in the first instance. Besides, the aluminum caged pedals can be adjusted and secured for a safe and comfortable ride.

【Ergonomical & Adjustable Seat Cushion】 Our exercise bike is equipped highly resilient and breathable cushion, which not only reduces vibration when riding, but also meets the ergonomic design, making it more comfortable for exercisers. In addition, the adjustable seat can be moved horizontally or vertically to suit your different training posture and height requirements. (Recommended height 4.8ft-6ft)

【LCD Monitor & Device Holder】 The LCD monitor and pulse sensor on the handlebar tracks your exercise time, speed, distance, calories burned and pulse, so that you can adjust your exercise speed correspondingly for more efficient workouts. This device holder allows you to watch videos or movies while pedaling, adding unlimited fun to your workout.

title: Peloton Indoor Exercise Bikes, Original Peloton Bike and Bike+
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Exercise Bikes
features: [Value-packed membership] A Peloton All-Access Membership must be purchased separately in order to access Peloton content on your Bike+. You’ll pay $44/mo for your entire household and get unlimited access to our entire library of content available on your Bike+ and the Peloton App. Age, height, and weight restrictions apply. Your account can be activated during Bike+ setup

[Add on more than cardio with the turn of a screen] ROTATING TOUCHSCREEN: Effortlessly move from cycling to the floor with a screen that has 360° of movement. 23.8” ANTI-GLARE HD TOUCHSCREEN: Designed so you can see your workout at any angle. STUDIO-QUALITY SOUND: Front and rear-facing speakers immerse you in sound.

[New ways to keep you motivated] INTRODUCING PELOTON ENTERTAINMENT: You can now stream TV shows, movies, and live sports with Peloton Entertainment. NEW AND IMPROVED FEATURES: Releasing updates and new features based on Member feedback ensures you have the tools to stay focused and meet your goals. NEW CONTENT: We’re always exploring new ways to train with gamified workouts, scenic rides, training programs, and more

[The ultimate cycling experience] AUTO RESISTANCE: Go hands-free and have your resistance automatically adjusted to match instructor callouts. ON SCREEN CONTROLS: Use Auto-resistance when you want and easily turn it off when you don’t with a tap of the lock icon. TRACK YOUR OUTPUT WITH CONFIDENCE: Bike+ automatically re-calibrates at the beginning of every ride, reliably measuring your watts and resistance

[Find, plan, and customize workouts] CUSTOM-BUILD YOUR WORKOUT: Line up classes and easily go from one to the next with Stacked Classes. Add on things like warm-ups, stretching, yoga, and more to your workout. FILTER TO FIND CLASSES: Sort by length, difficulty, class type, music, instructor, and more. PREVIEW CLASS PLANS: See the movements you’ll do in class, segment breakdowns, and the music playlists before jumping in.

[Monitor heart rate, workout performance, and more] CONNECT HEART RATE MONITORS: Easily connect any ANT+ heart rate monitor to your Peloton Bike+. TRACK PERFORMANCE: Pair your Apple or Wear OS watch to the Peloton Watch App to track heart rate and workout metrics in any class. REAL-TIME METRICS: See in-class metrics like cadence, output, resistance, heart rate, distance and more.

[On screen metrics] TRACK PROGRESS OVER TIME: Check workout streaks, personal bests, goals achieved, and more. LEADERBOARD: See who’s in class, give out high-fives, and chase others up the Leaderboard for some friendly competition.

[Workout in compact spaces and beyond] 4’x2’ FOOTPRINT: Peloton Bike+ only needs the space the size of a small yoga mat. WORKOUTS BEYOND BIKE+: Add on strength, yoga, HIIT, and more off to the side of Peloton Bike+ or anywhere you’d like using Peloton App, included with All-Access Membership.

[Measurements & requirements] We require leaving 24” on all four sides to store and train on your Bike+. Keeping your Bike+ in a room with a minimum ceiling height of 8’ will ensure adequate headroom while riding. Dimensions: 59” L x 59” H x 22” W; Screen: 24” diagonal; Weight: 140 lbs; Power cord length: 10’. User requirements – Height range: 4’11”–6’5”; weight maximum: 297 lbs; age minimum: 14.

[Self assembly] The Bike+ package is extremely heavy and might require more than one person to lift or carry. Use lifting aids and proper lifting techniques when moving or assembling the Peloton Bike+. A second person may be helpful when raising and lowering the Bike+. Lifting heavy objects can cause muscle strain and back injuries. Heavy objects can also fall and cause injury and physical damage.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Sunny Health & Fitness Belt Drive Indoor Cycling Bike - SF-B1423 
The new standard in home fitness! Sunny Health & Fitness SF-B1423 Belt Drive Indoor Cycling Bike offers all of the necessities for an amazing cycling workout along with any and everything all at-home fitness enthusiasts could wish for! Between its smoother, quieter belt drive operation and total portability with transportation wheels, your home will transform into a gym and back in no time! 
Digital monitor
Heavy duty 40 lb flywheel
Felt pad resistance system
Micro-adjustable resistance
Device holder
Caged foot pedals
DIGITAL MONITOR 
Tracking your progress on the SF-B1423 is simple with the Digital Monitor screen! Digital monitor helps track important workout data. 
40 LB FLYWHEEL 
The heavier the flywheel, the smoother the ride! Engineered for speed and stability this flywheel will create more momentum for longer periods of time keeping your workout going the distance. 
ADJUSTABLE RESISTANCE 
With a simple adjustment, you can increase or decrease resistance so your workout can remain challenging and effective throughout your fitness journey. 
FREE ONLINE WORKOUTS 
Get the most out of your stationary bike with our streamable, guided cycle bike workout series. Follow along to workout videos - all designed for your Sunny Health & Fitness bike. 
BOTTLE HOLDER 
Stay hydrated in the most demanding of workouts. The convenient drinks holder keeps your favorite refreshing beverage within arm’s reach! 
FOOT CAGE PEDALS 
Lock in and feel the momentum of your machine with foot cage pedals. Proper foot placement is essential to any biking workout! Avoid foot slippage at increased levels of speed and intensity. 
FITTING & ADJUSTMENTS 
The seat can be adjusted for height and proximity to handlebars for setting up your cycle bike, sizing and fitting. 
Adjustable Seat to Handlebar Distance: Min 17" / Max 21"
Max User Leg Inseam: Min 28" / Max 36"
PORTABILITY WHEELS 
Simply tilt and roll out for use or away for storage, no need for heavy lifting or muscle strain. The wheels at the front of the unit allow the user to move their bike around with ease.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Note: Proper sizing is crucial, so we recommend measuring the dimensions of your equipment before making a purchase. 
The mat is soft and elastic. There may be a measurement error of 0.4" - 0.8" for the product size, but it does not affect usage.
23.6" x 51.2" size is mainly intended for stationary bike, such as Bike & Bike Plus( your equipment length< 51.2 in, your equipment width<23.6 in)
30" x 60" mat size is suitable for staionary bikes, small-sized treadmills, bike trainers and compact under desk treadmills( your equipment length<60 in, your equipment width<30 in)
36" x 72" & 36" x 84" suitable for staionary bikes, ellipticals, pelotreadmills, other treadmills(pls measure your equipment size).
36" x 84" mat not suitable for pelorower
Does it work for my floor/carpet? 
we have found customers using bike mat in many different floors including carpet(low pile), laminate, inlaid linoleum, hardwood, ceramic tile, vinyl sheet, vinyl plank, concrete, etc. And the feedback is great. 
Does the mat damage the hardwood floor over time? 
NO, it will not damage it, our customer put it on wood floors now for a few months and it has zero scuffs, stains, etc. Its made out of wood floor friendly material! 
Is it reasonable to cut this to size? Can you get a clean edge with a razor knife? 
Yes. If you use a straight edge you can certainly cut to size. While it’s a nice thickness, it’s definitely soft enough to cut cleanly with sharp razor.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Desk Bike Pedal Exerciser 
This desk cycle is a lightweight and portable piece of arm and leg workout equipment that helps you incorporate healthy cardio and muscle toning into sedentary activities. Whether you use this workout bike to get exercise during your workday at the office or for rehabilitation while watching your favorite television show on the sofa, it’s a great way to add physical activity to your day. 
Exercise Anywhere 
Add more movement to your day with this foot pedal exerciser, which allows you to burn calories and tone muscles during any seated activity. Use it while you’re enjoying your morning coffee or relaxing in front of the television in the evening. The compact size means you can even use this cardio machine under your desk at work. 
Easy to Use 
Easily adjust the resistance level using a simple tension knob to get the workout that suits your needs, whether you use the low-tension setting for rehabilitative purposes, or prefer a higher intensity for strength training and muscle toning. Tracking your workout is easy too, thanks to the large LCD screen which displays time, distance, calories, and pedal count. 
Slip-Resistant Features 
The desk bike pedal exerciser has rubber pads on the base for added stability during use, and comes with a 19.7-inch-square non-slip mat to place under the peddler to help protect your floors and prevent slipping. The pedals of the leg exerciser feature improved straps that can be adjusted to your foot for a secure fit and a more comfortable workout.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Stamina Recumbent Exercise Bike with Upper Body Exerciser 
Why isolate the upper and lower body when you can work both simultaneously? With the Stamina Recumbent Exercise Bike with Upper Exerciser can help build cardiovascular endurance, burn calories and strengthen your arms and legs. This comfortable, quiet bike utilizes magnetic resistance, so it won’t disturb you or others. 
This workout bike offers 8 levels of magnetic resistance for the lower body and adjustable tension dial resistance for the upper body. Experience total body workout and boost your cardiovascular endurance with this recumbent exercise bike. 
Built-in Hand Pedals and Easy Adjust Lever 
The built-in upper hand pedals in the this recumbent bike offer multiple grip positions for the upper body to engage the back, arms, shoulders, chest and core. The separate tension dial for the upper body provides customization. Whether you’re concentrating solely on your arms or using the Upper Body Exerciser in tandem with your lower body, you’ll be in complete control. 
Additionally, we included the Upper Body Exercise easy-adjust lever. Just push it up with your foot, adjust the angle of the exerciser to where it’s easy to reach and release the pedal to lock it into place. 
Ergonomic Fitness Bike | Engineered for Comfort 
This exercise bike provides an ergonomic, relaxed sitting position that’s easier on your back. The low step-through design allows a safe way to get on and off. When focusing on the lower body exclusively, use the stationary handles for more stability. Plus, they’re padded for your comfort. This recumbent bike also features textured pedals, ergonomic handlebars, and an extra-large cushioned, upholstered seat and backrest for maximum comfort. Even more, the multiple height and seat adjustment knobs make customizing the fit of your exercise bike easier than ever. The scanning, multi-function fitness monitor displays your workout time, calories burned, distance and more. 
Space Saving Foldable Bike 
When you’re finished, you’ll be able to save space with the bike’s foldable frame and wheels. After you fold the frame, just wheel it away to the nearest closet or corner. 
Experience connected fitness with this home gym equipment with the müüv app. With smart guided coaching, exercise demo videos, personalized workouts, assembly videos, and more, müüv provides the best workout and fitness experience with your Stamina equipment. Download the müüv app on the Apple App Store or the Google Play store.

features: EXERCISE BIKE: Our exercise bike allows for 16 levels of resistance adjustment and 30 dB silent ride. That's because it utilizes a non-friction magnetic resistance system that takes advantage of silent and smooth resistance adjustments.Multiple levels of resistance to meet the workout needs of beginners to professionals. and he low decibel ride keeps you from disturbing others.

EASY ASSEMLY: Tailored for all skill levels, from beginners to experts, our stationary bike offers a stressless assembly experience. With clear, comprehensive instruction and an accompanying installation video, you'll have your bike set up in no time, regardless of your technical proficiency.

SCIENTIFICALLY ENGINEERED FOR 300LBS CAPACITY: This exercise bike boasts a robust construction with a maximum weight capacity of 300 lbs, making it suitable for a wide range of users. Crafted from premium-grade steel and reinforced with a double golden triangle frame design, it offers unparalleled strength and stability. Furthermore, it features an ergonomic seat cushion that combines comfort with durability, ensuring a painless ride even for extended sessions, regardless of your body type.

VERSATILE FIT FOR 4.6-6FT: Our indoor exercise bike accommodates a diverse range of heights, from 4.6 to 6 feet, through its 5-level adjustable seat height mechanism. This feature ensures that individuals of varying body types can comfortably enjoy their workouts at home, fostering a shared fitness experience. Additionally, the bike's front and rear support tubes feature 6 levels of fine-tuning, effectively compensating for uneven floor surfaces, ensuring a stable and secure ride for all users.

SATISFACTION COMMITMENT: We offer a prompt telephone message service, ensuring to attend to buyers' inquiries within 12 hours. Rest assured, we stand behind our products with a comprehensive one-year service commitment. Any issues you encounter with your purchase will be promptly addressed until you are fully satisfied.

REAL-TIME FITNESS DATA: The stationary bike can record your fitness data including pulse rate, calorie, time, distance, speed. These data will be displayed on LCD screen. And the work out data can auto start and auto close, As long as you start to ride immediately automatically record the exercise data, and it will turn off automatically after you stop using it for a few minutes.

title: pooboo Folding Exercise Bike, Foldable Fitness Stationary Bike Machine, Upright Indoor Cycling Bike, Magnetic X-Bike with 8-Level Adjustable Resistance, Bottle Holder & Back Support Cushion for Home Gym Workout
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Exercise Bikes
features: 4-IN-1 Folding Exercise Bike for Home Workout: The upright posture of this bike provides you with high-intensity exercise, helping you burn more calories. The semi-recumbent posture offers a low-impact and more comfortable riding experience. Additionally, this bike comes with arm resistance bands (which can be attached either at the front or rear of the bike) to help tone your upper muscles and provide a complete body workout

Bottle Holder: We've intentionally added a Bottle Holder to this bike, which is something that other X-BIKE models don't have. Conveniently located at arm's length, it helps you stay hydrated during your cardio workouts. The adjustable size design accommodates different bottle types

Compact Design & Easy to Move: The folding exercise bike is extremely suitable for the small living room because it doesn't take up too much space. And it can be fully folded up to occupy minimal space for storage when not in use. It comes with transport wheels for you to move this exercise bike easily from room to room in your home gym

Stable & Suitable for Different Heights: This foldable fitness stationary bike is constructed with thicker, higher-quality steel, supporting a maximum load of 300 pounds. Its stable triangle structure ensures safety during intense workouts. The recommended user height for this bike ranges from 4'4" to 6'3"(Upgraded)

8-Level Adjustable Magnetic Resistance: The upright indoor cycling bike offers a wide range of adjustable resistance levels. We utilize silent and smooth magnetic flywheels to ensure a noise-free home exercise experience. The 8-level magnetic resistance adjustment caters to your diverse fitness needs

Multi-Function Fitness Monitor with Integrated Mobile Device Holder: This monitor tracks your time, speed, distance, calories burned, and heart rate, offering real-time exercise data as you cycle. Enjoy your favorite shows on the monitor's integrated mobile device holder while working out—what a fun way to stay motivated

Oversized Adjustable Seat Cushion: With the aim of enhancing the home fitness experience, we have incorporated a large, soft seat cushion to offer you the utmost comfort and support. Thanks to the adjustable seat, it accommodates most members of your family

Gift for Your Family/Friends: The POOBOO X-Bike is a MUST-HAVE, thoughtful gift for the well-being of your loved ones. It produces minimal noise, requires little space, and is easy to assemble, move, and store. You won't regret making this choice

aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
GOFLYSHINE strives for perfection. GOFLYSHINE stationary bikes with a high quality alloy steel flywheel carrying more momentum are best for a realistic riding experience. Thickened steel frame, improved details, this super silent and stable cycle bike is a must-have in your home gym! flywheel carrying more momentum are best for a realistic riding experience. Thickened steel frame, improved details, this super silent and stable cycle bike is a must-have in your home gym! 

A Must-have Cycling Bike for Home Gym 
ABOUT GOFLYSHINE 
GOFLYSHINE Fitness offers a wide variety of high-quality exercise equipments and we've been working on it for 24 years. Our goal is to provide you with professional indoor fitness products, exercise anytime, anywhere, and achieve the best exercise experience. From novice to advanced, you'll find equipment that matches your fitness level, workout space, and budget. 
Best Chioce for Home Gym, A True Everyday Use 
Still look around & hard to choose? 
GOFLYSHINE stationary bike for seniors, adults, women and men, a good exercise equipment and gift for you, your friends, your families.Comes half-installed, simple installation, usually can be completed in 40 minutes. 
GOFLYSHINE cycling bike features many customizable settings. It is decked out with a alloy steel flywheel, 2-ways adjustable handbar, and 4-ways seat.LCD monitor and water bottle holder. Transportation wheels make it easy to move. Maximum user weight: 280 lbs. 
Fully adjustable- suitable for the whole family. 
Adjustable resistance- for daily relaxation and vigorous aerobic cycling. 
Caged nonslip pedals- prevents slipping when riding fast. 
IPad Holder- put your phone/pad on, enjoy music/movies when exercise. 
Multi-functional monitor- tracks your time, speed, distance, calories burned and odometer. 
FEATURES 
Adjustable Bike 
GOFLYSHINE stationary bikes are designed for the whole family. Clear scales, 6 seat heights, 6 handlebar heights. Updated adjusting knobs bring a better cycling experience. 
Stable And Durable 
Triangular structure, high quality steel provides higher stability.The heavy duty steel frame and belt drive system brings you a comfortable fitness experience, keeps the exercise bike steady and securely riding. Support Up To 280lbs. 
Resistance Adjustment Knob 
Updated Multifunctional knob. Press for an emergency stop. Ride uphills or downhill when you tighten or loosen the knob, simulating real road riding. Thickened felt with a longer lifespan carries a good riding experience. 
Comfortable Saddle Cover 
No poor seat again! No terrible feeling again after long riding! The GOFLYSHINE fitness bike comes with a thick sporty style seat cover, which is soft, comfortable, and breathable. It reduces fatigue when you ride a long time and reduces your bottom form pressure. 
FEATURES 
Safer Caged Pedal 
Aluminum alloyed, more sturdy & non-slip. Buckle design for easier tightness adjustments. Premium adjustable straps are super easy to tighten or loosen just like wearing a sandal. GOFLYSHINE strives for the best user experience through updating product details. 
Adjustable Leveler 
Very easy to fine-tune. We select the most stable adjustable levelers. You can balance the bike in case of unevenness on the floor. Soft PVC protects floors or pads from scratches in your home gym. 
Easy Move 
Two transport wheels help you move this workout bike easily. Most cycle bike comes with hard plastic wheels. Hard surfaces may damage your floors. Different from others, our wheels are of high quality, strong, with a slightly soft surface. 
Professional Tools 
Tired of cheap tools of poor quality? GOFLYSHINE exercise bike comes with a professional tool kit. Long wrench, no hard edges, effort saving for easier installation in about 30 minutes. 
Why Choose GOFLYSHINE Exercise Bike? 
√ Fully adjustable- 1 machine for the whole family. 
√ Enjoy a silent indoor cycling experience. The high-strength belt drives the flywheel, smooth, wear-resistant, and rotates silently. 
√ Thickened steel, triangular frame secure absolute stability and longer lifespan. 
√ A smart personal trainer. LCD monitor tracks cycle data to help you workout scientifically and healthily. 
√ Adjustable resistance- for daily relaxation and vigorous aerobic cycling. 
√ Caged nonslip pedals- prevents slipping when riding fast. 
√ Pad Holder- put your phone/pad on, enjoy music/movies when exercise. 
√ We provide fully satisfactory service. ONE YEAR free parts replacement+ 24 hours GOFLYSHINE Support.

features: ▲Heavy Flywheel Exercise Bikes Increases Stability:▼ This TECHMOO under desk bike pedal exerciser adopts an internal 5LBS metal flywheel to greatly improves the stability. Not only makes it effortlessly to use for a long time, but it also avoids the movement problem of the trainer during use.

▲Carpet Special Anti-Kid Pad:▼ The normal 4pcs wave shape pad enhanced the frictional force between bike and floor, which brings steady using. Don’t worry, these nail point pads and normal pads are made in soft rubber and will not hurt your carpet or floor. Which makes the mini exercise bike more stable whether on the carpet or on the ground.

▲Personalized Massage Experience:▼ Mini cycle bike is designed for both on floor for leg exercise or on desk for arm exercise. This pedal exerciser fit offer low impact for light arm, shoulder leg and knee recovery exercise. Each pedal has 20 built-in massage point for foot and hand stimulation massage, exercise peddler bike helping to improve blood circulation and physical mobility, thereby enhancing overall health.

▲Functional LCD Monitor Displays:▼ Portable foot cycle arm & leg peddler machine with LCD screen displays includes exercise time, revolution count, revolutions per minute(RPM), calories burned and resetting button and easily to arrange your exercise information data. Moreover includes a scan feature that can show all measurements in sequence, make you know your exercising journey more easily.

▲Exerciser for Everyone:▼ This mini bike is great for the elderly to do low impact exerciser, which help stimulate blood circulation, and is great for injured people to do knee or shoulder recovery exercise after surgery, activate stiff leg and arm or other body rehabilitation.

title: Sunny Health & Fitness Pro Cycling Stationary Bike, 40 LB Flywheel & 4-Way Adjustable Seat for Home Exercise & Indoor Cycle/Cardio Workout, Optional Free SunnyFit App Bluetooth Connection
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Exercise Bikes
description: Start an in-home cardio workout with the SF-B901 Pro Indoor Cycling Bike by Sunny Health & Fitness. Tailor your workout with the four-way adjustable seat and two-way adjustable handlebars, which are designed around comfort and performance. Feel confident and secure when you slide your feet into the universal toe cages on the stationary bike. Enjoy a smooth and challenging workout experience when you pedal against the consistent chain-drive mechanism using the large muscles of your hips and thighs. Maintain cycling momentum on the fitness bike with the sturdy 40-pound chrome flywheel. Switch up your routine and easily change cycling position on the home exercise bike with the multi-grip handlebars. Increase workout resistance smoothly, effectively, and quietly with the micro-adjustable dual felt-pad resistance. Designed with heavy-duty metal, this bike supports a maximum user weight of 275 lb. After you workout, move the indoor cycling bike across your home with the built-in transportation wheels. Build a strong cardiovascular system while you burn calories on the Sunny Health & Fitness SF-B901 Pro Indoor Cycling Bike.
features: ADVANCED PERFORMANCE MONITOR: You can keep track of speed, distance, time, calories, odometer, RPM, Pulse, and Auto On/Off or use Scan to cycle through each metric.
40 LB FLYWHEEL: Designed for speed and stability to create more momentum for longer periods of time keeping your workout going.
PULSE SENSOR: Helps track your target heart rate and maintain it during extended workouts.
ADJUSTABLE FRICTION RESISTANCE: The dual felt pad resistance system gives you the sense of being on the road and the micro-tension controller provides just the right amount of resistance you need.
DEVICE HOLDER: Place your device above the digital monitor and start your workout routine by watching your favorite online training videos by Sunny Health & Fitness.

aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
40 LB FLYWHEEL 
Sunny Health & Fitness' flywheel is second to none when it comes to stability, sturdiness, and quality. Creating more momentum for longer periods of time and keeping your workouts going the distance! 
FELT RESISTANCE 
Continuing the signature resistance system of the original, the PRO II is equipped with a quiet and smooth dual felt fabric brake pad system. This system allows for various tension levels. 
4-WAY ADJUSTABLE SEAT 
The seat can be adjusted for height and proximity to handlebars for setting up your cycle bike, sizing and fitting. Max User Leg Inseam: Min 28 in/ Max 41 in. 
DEVICE HOLDER 
Stay engaged with your favorite apps or workout videos while taking advantage of the handlebar mounted device holder. 
BOTTLE HOLDER 
Hydrate with ease during any point of your workout with the convenient drink holder. Proper hydration is critical to optimal performance during long intense rides. 
DIGITAL MONITOR 
Track all essential metrics with the Advanced Digital Monitor: Speed, Distance, Time, Calories Burned, Odometer, RPM, Pulse and Scan. 
PULSE SENSOR 
Measuring your pulse rate is an important tool for exercising correctly and efficiently. The more steady and prolonged the elevated heart rate is during the workout, the more fat is burned. 
RESISTANCE KNOB 
Switch up the intensity of your workout on your PRO II with the convenient tension knob. With a simple twist, increase or decrease resistance so your PRO II workout remains challenging and effective!

title: Sunny Health & Fitness Elite Recumbent Cross Trainer & Elliptical Machine with Arm Exercisers for Home Arm/Leg Training, Easy Adjust Seat & Mesh Backrest, Free SunnyFit App Bluetooth Connectivity
inStockText: In Stock  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Elliptical Trainers
features: FREE CONNECTED APP: Enjoy FREE access to the SunnyFit App with every Sunny Health & Fitness product—no membership fees! Dive into 1,000+ trainer-led workouts, explore 10,000+ virtual scenic tours, track your progress, challenge others, and much more!

ELECTROMAGNETIC RESISTANCE: With 16 different levels of electromagnetic resistance, you will be able to set your workout intensity level to perfectly meet your needs. Crank up the resistance for a challenging full-body workout, or dial it down for a low-impact and low-intensity recovery session.

WORKOUT VARIETY: Take the guesswork out of your exercise session and use one of the 12 pre-programmed elliptical workouts built into the machine. If you prefer to customize your own workout, the Smart Recumbent Elliptical Cross Trainer allows you to create up to 4 unique user programs for a personalized workout experience.
DESIGNED FOR LOW-IMPACT: Protect your joints while still challenging yourself. Our recumbent elliptical allows you to improve cardiovascular health and build strength but is also gentle on your body.

FULL BODY WORKOUT: Work various muscle groups in both your upper and lower body by simultaneously using the moveable handles and elliptical-sized foot pedals. If you want a more focused workout, use the handles or foot pedals independently for a targeted upper or lower body burn.

EASY ON AND OFF: The easy on-off design provides a simple, hassle-free transition from start to finish. With minimal obstruction between the handlebars and the seat, you can step through your machine and sit down safely before starting your workout.

COMFORTABLE RIDE: Enjoy the padded seat and contoured mesh back support for a more comfortable and pleasant workout. With the easy seat adjuster, you no longer need to get off the machine to adjust the seat to your height. Simply engage the handle by your side and adjust to your comfort level.
MAXIMUM WEIGHT CAPACITY: The sturdy, premium-quality design allows for weight capacities of up to 300 lbs.

SUNNY STATE OF MIND: In our 20 years of serving the fitness community, we have impacted the lives of over 10 million customers, and we are confident that our equipment is not only built to last but will also enable you to achieve your cardio goals. Our vision and core mission is to stand beside you throughout your entire process. We enable you to enjoy your workouts with our products and our SunnyFit app which comes with over 1000+ workouts taught by our professionally certified Sunny Trainers.

PERFORMANCE MONITOR: Track various fitness metrics during each workout. View your time, speed, RPM, distance, Watts, calories, heart rate, target heart rate, and resistance on the digital performance monitor. Train at your perfect intensity level every workout!

features: REAL-TIME DATA INTERACTION: The wide seat exercise bike is equipped with the self-developed MERACH APP and a Gaming APP FantomFite, both free to use once paired. USER-FRIENDLY BIKE: This workout indoor bike with high density foam and dual spring suspension design helps alleviate discomfort during your ride. Additionally, the handlebars feature advanced ergonomic designs for a more comfortable grip, allowing you to focus on your workout without distractions

NO WORRIES CUSTOMER SUPPORT: We offer detailed assembly instructions and videos for easy setup of your spinning bike. Additionally, we provide a 12-month warranty. If you have any questions or concerns, our support team is ready to assist you promptly

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
AGM Comfact Under Desk Bike Pedal Exerciser 
Under Desk Bike is a stable, quiet, minutes-to-install mini exercise bike that is perfect for sedentary office workers to improve circulation and exercise arms and legs, for gym-goers to warm up and build strength, and for seniors to rehabilitate. 
With life’s busy schedule, the Mini Exercise Bike Pedal Exerciser ensures you can squeeze in a workout that fits you. Just an under desk bike pedal exerciser, placed under the desk to ride, to achieve the freedom to exercise at any time. 
LCD Display 
Under desk bike comes with LCD display shows Time, Distance, Count, T-Count, Calories, 5 values clearly, it automatically calculate a number of laps, so exercise becomes traceable! 
Adjust the Resistance 
The tension knob can be used to increase resistance clockwise and decrease resistance counterclockwise according to training goals, meeting the exercise needs of warm-ups, rehabilitation, exercise novices, sedentary office workers and the elderly. 
Wider + Thickened Non-Slip Pedal 
Sturdy pedal exerciser non-slip pedal for safety and efficiency! The foot cover design increases the friction between the foot and the pedal, not easy to fall off. 
Durable Round Belt-Driver System 
The internally lubricated belt-driver system provides a smoother, quieter ride than a chain drive. Polished exterior black frame isolates from internal parts while riding for safety. 
Arm Exerciser 
Activate the arms, chest and back flab, exercise the flabby arms, biceps, back fat, and prevent the accumulation of flab. Suitable for people who usually do not exercise often, can exercise to the most easily ignored parts of the usual. 
Leg Exerciser 
When exercising the legs, pay attention to tighten the core, smooth riding mini exercise bike, can effectively exercise legs, especially suitable for sedentary people, promote blood circulation, reduce the risk of sedentary. 
Compact Design 
Under desk bike mini exercise bike can be used whilst watching TV or reading. The compact design pedal exerciser can be easily stored when not in use. 
Weight: 9.3 lb 
Size: 16.1*12.5*7..4 inch 
Home Mini Desk Exercise Bike 
This home mini exercise bike, so you do not need to go to the gym, yoga studio, to be able to exercise anywhere, anytime. Suitable for the elderly, sedentary, fitness needs of the population, both men and women.

title: HARISON Pro Recumbent Exercise Bike 400 lbs Capacity, Magnetic Recumbent bike for Adult and Seniors, Recumbent Stationary bike for Home with Smart Bluetooth App, 2 in 1 LCD Monitor and Tablet Holder, Heart Rate monitor

features: HARISON Exclusive US Mate Magnetic System: HARISON recumbent exercise bike features an innovative magnetic resistance system, offering 16 levels of smooth resistance adjustable with a tension knob. Whether you seek an easy ride or a more challenging workout, this system ensures each pedal stroke is whisper-quiet and exceptionally smooth. Focus on your fitness goals without distractions, thanks to its low-maintenance design that allows you to concentrate fully on your workout.

Premium Solid Recumbent Bike with 400 lbs Capacity: Constructed with a heavy-duty stainless steel frame, this exercise bike combines ergonomic design for optimal comfort with precise performance. The user-friendly step-through design allows for easy entry and exit, accommodating all fitness levels. Its corrosion-resistant and oxidation-resistant materials ensure long-lasting durability. With a robust construction supporting up to 400 lbs, this recumbent bike is perfect for users seeking to elevate their workout experience.

Recumbent Exercise Bike for Adults with 2-in-1 LCD Monitor &Tablet Holder: The HARISON recumbent bike boasts a multifunctional LCD display that tracks time, speed, distance, calories, RPM, odometer, and heart rate in real time. Its 2-in-1 tablet holder and water bottle holder enhance convenience, letting you enjoy movies or music while you cycle. This bike is perfect for seniors, adults, and the whole family, making cardio workouts enjoyable and accessible for everyone.

Multifunctional Recumbent Exercise Bike for Home: The HARISON recumbent bike features a comfortable seated, reclined position, ideal for seniors and individuals with joint issues or recovering from injuries. It effectively reduces the risk of heart disease while boosting cardiovascular endurance. Additionally, it strengthens various lower body muscle groups and aids in weight loss, making it an excellent choice for the entire family’s fitness needs.

Fully Adjustable Recumbent Bike: The HARISON exercise bike features a spacious adjustable seat (11.4" x 15.7") designed for home comfort. Padded with high-density foam, both the seat and backrest offer essential support for your hips and back, promoting proper posture while maximizing comfort. The sliding seat rail system easily adjusts to accommodate users from 4.8 to 6.4 feet tall, ensuring your legs maintain a comfortable length for optimal workout results.

Easy Installation: With the 90% pre-assembled design, this HARISON indoor recumbent bike could be fully assembled in 20 minutes with the user guide and the assembly video provided by HARISON. Our professional customer service team will promptly reply your questions within 24 hours if you need any assistance!

30-Day No-Cost Trial & 1-Year Warranty: HARISON recumbent exercise bike includes a 30-day no-cost trial and a 1-year warranty for your peace of mind. We are dedicated to providing high-performance premium features in our product, ensuring exceptional value for your investment. Our experienced team is dedicated to providing evidence of our commitment every day!

title: Motorized Pedal Exerciser, Electric Pedal Exerciser for Arm and Leg Low Impact Exercise Rehabilitation, No Resistance, Suitable for Seated Leg Exercise and Arm Exercise for Elderly People
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Exercise Bikes
description: Motorized Pedal Exerciser, Electric Pedal Exerciser for Arm and Leg Low Impact Exercise Rehabilitation, No Resistance, Suitable for Seated Leg Exercise and Arm Exercise for Elderly
features: [Motorized Pedal Exerciser] Physiotherapy rehabilitation bike for low impact arm and leg exercises, motorized assisted pedal exercise trainer, motorized rehabilitation pedal exercise bike, ideal for long term care and rehabilitation.

[Configuration options] 60W motor with timer function. Set timer for 1 to 15 minutes. Automatic procedures. P1-P5 mode switching, gear function. The speed is adjustable from 1 to 12. Different gears can be adjusted to suit different speed trainings. Rotation function: clockwise, counterclockwise.

[Remote Control - Display] The remote control makes it unnecessary to squat. The multi-function LCD display on this mini pedal exerciser tracks your time/distance/speed/calories as you ride, making it easy to read.

[Exercise Program] This compact pedal exerciser can be used to strengthen arms and legs, effectively increase blood circulation, improve endurance, reduce stress, stimulate muscle movement to stimulate nerves; compress muscle tone, improve joint range of motion, reduce spasms and soften the body; maintain or restore walking ability, enhance limb coordination and promote health

【Applicable to the crowd】 Motorized pedal gym is suitable for the elderly and tetraplegic patients, exercise the knee, foot, leg and arm. Special Note: This product is an electric assisted trainer with adjustable speed of 1-12 and no resistance function. (Suitable for the elderly, post-operative rehabilitation and low-intensity training people exercise). If you experience limb discomfort while using this product, then you must stop using it and consult your personal physician.

What you get We offer one year of free replacement parts for our physical therapy equipment. Our customer support team will answer any questions within 24 hours and ensure that we have the right solution for you within a short period of time.

title: 3G Cardio Elite RB X Recumbent Exercise Bike - FreeSync FTMS Bluetooth Smart App Connectivity - Compact 49" (L) - Oversized Soft 4-Way Adj. Seat - 350 lb Cap. - Low Step-Thru Design - Commercial Grade
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Exercise Bikes
description: The 3G Cardio elite RB recumbent bike features an incredibly comfortable, adjustable seat and back rest which will conform to your body shape and size. Extremely well built and with a small compact overall length of 49-inch, the elite RB recumbent bike will fit into spaces other bikes won't. Easy roll transport wheels and a smaller, easy to see over upper console will make working out a breeze! With a user weight capacity of 350 lbs. and a 7-year parts warranty, the Elite RB Bike will feel like you brought the health club home.
features: 3G Cardio, an Arizona-based company with a combined 50 years of experience in the fitness industry, provides commercial-level quality and superior value. We offer an unmatched lifetime frame warranty, 7-year parts, and 1-year in-home labor (scroll down for commercial warranty), and you are only a phone call away from 5-star customer service 9-5 weekdays PST.
FreeSync FTMS Bluetooth Connectivity and Interactive 3rd Party Fitness App Connectivity. Non-coded wireless heart rate strap included.
Our oversized, highly adjustable cushioned seat provides incredible comfort and for most users between 5’ and 6’5”. Seat tilts 5 positions and forward/back 25 positions.
The Airflow Mesh Flex backrest tilts and adjusts to conform to your body shape and size (up to 350 lbs.), keeping your back cool.
Overall, small compact size (49" L x 27" W x 43" H), allows our bike to easily roll (115 lbs.) through a standard doorway. Metal handle and wheels built into frame.

Handheld heart rate sensors & wireless heart rate strap (included) keep you informed as you challenge yourself through 16 levels of magnetic resistance. Includes 12 preprogrammed and 3 heart rate workouts. Preset calories, time, wattage, and distance goals as desired.
Narrow Q factor distance between pedals makes for an extremely ergonomically correct ride.
NO MEMBERSHIP REQUIRED with our equipment! BYOS = Bring your own screen with FTMS Bluetooth. Tablet shelf included.

features: 【15.6" HD TOUCHSCREEN】Artist-generated interactive 3D stages turn every room into an immersive workout via our 15.6" HD touchscreen.

breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Exercise Bikes
features: 【SMART RECUMBENT BIKE FOR LOW-IMPACT FITNESS】This joint-friendly bike, compatible with the SunnyFit app, is ideal for low-impact workouts, especially for seniors. The cushioned, adjustable seat maximizes comfort, and built-in resistance bands provide options for upper body exercise.

【FREE FITNESS APP CONNECTION】 Enjoy FREE access to the SunnyFit APP with NO membership fees! Dive into 1,000+ trainer-led workouts, explore 10,000+ virtual scenic tours, track your progress, challenge others, and much more!
【QUIET & SMOOTH OPERATION】 Featuring a magnetic belt-drive mechanism, this bike offers a quiet and smooth workout experience with 16 levels of magnetic resistance to match your fitness level.

【ADJUSTABLE CUSHIONED SEAT, EASY ON/OFF DESIGN】 The wide, cushioned, adjustable seat and padded backrest, along with the flip-able side handle for easy on and off, allow you to exercise with optimal comfort, while the long inseam accommodates users of various heights.
【FULL-MOTION EXERCISE BANDS】Includes two 20LB resistance bands with foam grips. The pulley and swivel system provides a full range of motion to effectively engage major muscle groups.
【BUILT TO LAST WITH 300LB WEIGHT CAPACITY】 Constructed from high-grade steel, this robust bike supports up to 300LB, with a curved rear bar for enhanced stability and safety.

【ADVANCED DIGITAL MONITOR】 Personalize your training by setting time, distance, calorie, and heart rate goals. Track progress in real-time with the advanced digital monitor and use the built-in pulse sensor for precise workout metrics.

【ENHANCED CONVENIENCE】Stay entertained with the built-in device holder, hydrated with the easy-access bottle holder, and enjoy added flexibility with a dumbbell holder. Bulit-in transportation wheels ensure a stable and convenient workout experience.
【SAFE WORKOUT DESIGN】 Self-leveling pedals and adjustable foot straps ensure secure footing, while the curved rear base adds stability, providing peace of mind for a safe, steady workout every time.

【20+ YEARS OF EXCELLENCE】Sunny Health & Fitness, a U.S.-based company, offers top-quality equipment with a commitment to excellence. Our dedicated U.S. customer service team and certified trainers ensure a truly unmatched FIT FOR EVERYONE experience.

What’s the difference between the Sunny resistance bands and standard bands? 
The FREE resistance bands provide 20LB of resistance each and are attached to a pulley and swivel block, allowing for a wider motion range that effectively targets more muscle groups during your workout compared to standard bands. 
Will the heavy-duty design of the bike make it difficult to move? 
No, the recumbent bike weighs only 63.8LB thanks to its high commercial-grade steel construction. This makes it easy to move, while the robust frame ensures stability during workouts with a 300LB weight capacity. 
How does the bike accommodate seniors or individuals with hip problems? 
The flip-able design of the side handle allows seniors and individuals with hip problems to easily get on and off the bike, promoting comfort and independence during workouts. 
Is the bike suitable for taller individuals? 
Yes, with an adjustable inseam range of 27.2" to 35.8", the bike is perfect for individuals up to a maximum height of 6'4", ensuring a comfortable and effective workout experience for taller users. 
Will the bike disturb my family while I’m working out? 
No, the bike operates quietly thanks to its magnetic resistance and belt-drive mechanism, ensuring a whisper-quiet experience that won’t disturb your family during home therapy and training sessions.

items.text:
Adjustable Seat & Backrest
The easy-adjustable cushioned seat and backrest, featuring an extra-wide design, ensure the most optimal position for comfort.

8-Level Magnetic Resistance

The FB350 is recommended for users between 4'10" - 5'10". 
How do I adjust the resistance on the FB350? 
This bike has 8 levels of resistance that can be adjusted by turning the knob on the frame. 
Can I swap the seat on the FB350 for another type? 
The seat cannot be changed for another type of seat. 
How do you fold the FB350 bike? 
Fold the bike by removing the pin, folding the frame, and replacing the pin when it locks into place. 
What is the FB350 maximum weight limit? 
The FB350 is rated for users up to 225 lbs.

title: CIRCUIT FITNESS Circuit Fitness Magnetic Upright Exercise Bike with 15 Workout Presets, 300 lbs Capacity AMZ-594U
inStockText: Only 20 left in stock - order soon.  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Exercise Bikes
description: "Achieve a fitter and healthier body with the Upright Exercise Bike from Circuit Fitness! Never miss a workout. This revolutionary gear lets you train in the comfort of your home. Shed the extra weight by engaging in a fat-burning workout right in the comfort of your home with this exercise bike. This gear showcases a heavy-duty frame that effectively resists scratches and chips. heavy use. The bike’s large seat can be easily adjusted to accommodate users of different body sizes, allowing it to conform to each individual user’s height for exact motion. The gear’s engineered structure facilitates proper body form during movement, enabling your workout to take maximum effect on your specific target areas. This machine comes with a magnetic resistance system; 15 preset programs simulate the effects of biking on different terrains. The resistance settings can be selected on the screen, allowing you to control and customize your cardio training according to your skill level. The bike’s handy LCD display also tracks time, pulse rate, current speed, distance traveled, and calories burned for easier progress monitoring. To maximize comfort during workouts, the machine’s textured pedals are equipped with safety loops that stabilize your feet for comfortable cycling. This gear comes with transport wheels that enable you to conveniently move it from one room to another. An ideal addition to any home gym, this equipment also boasts a water-bottle holder and a media holder to keep you hydrated and entertained while you’re working out. Burn the extra calories and experience efficient cardio training—without having to pay for gym memberships—with the Circuit Fitness Upright Exercise Bike!"
features: HEAVY-DUTY CONSTRUCTION: Manufactured from high-grade plastic and steel, this bike features a durable frame that combines design and performance. The design facilitates quick entry and exit from the bike and it can support a user weighing up to 300 lbs

CUSTOMIZABLE CYCLING WORKOUT: Designed for fitness enthusiasts of all skill levels, this bike comes with 15 modes of preset levels that simulate the effects of biking on different terrains. Simply select the desired program to personalize your training

ERGONOMIC HANDLES AND SAFETY PEDALS: This gear has textured pedals with straps to prevent your feet from sliding. The bike’s pair of contoured handles allow for comfortable gripping and provide superior support to your upper body

PULSE SENSORS AND EASY-TO-READ MONITOR: This exercise bike comes with an LCD monitor that keeps track of distance traveled, time elapsed, calories burned, and current speed. Equipped with pulse sensors, it also monitors your heart rate

LARGE ADJUSTABLE SEAT: This stationary bike boasts an adjustable padded seat that can be moved up, down, forward, and backward to accommodate each user’s leg length. The seat’s locking-screw adjustment knob ensures a comfortable riding position

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Circuit Fitness Magnetic Upright Exercise Bike with Pulse Sensor AMZ-594U 
The Circuit Fitness Magnetic Upright Exercise Bike with Pulse Sensor uses magnetic resistance to create an efficient cardio workout for your home gym. The pulse sensor on this upright exercise bike helps you keep track of your heart rate so you can reach your calorie-shredding high-intensity interval training goals. In addition to displaying pulse, the LCD computer monitor displays time, distance, calories, and more. The computer also comes with 15 workout presets which will bring variation to your workouts. The large comfortable seat can be adjusted forward, backward, up, and down to make your ideal bike riding position, while the ergonomic handles allow you to comfortably hang on during long rides. Easily adjust resistance by the simple push of a button and move the bike as needed utilizing the transport wheels at the front of the bike. 
Water Bottle Holder 
Have your favorite drink in arms reach by placing your water bottle in the water bottle holder in front of the large LCD display. 
Tablet Holder 
Keep your favorite device in view so you can read or watch your favorite media during your long bike rides. 
Leveler 
Don’t let an unbalanced floor be an excuse. Easily level your bike by turning the leveler to your desired height and minimize any wiggling that occurs during use. 
Heart Rate Monitor 
The computer works together with the pulse sensor (located on the handle-bars) to track your heart rate. Monitoring your heart rate zone allows you to maximize the efficiency of your workout – perfect for HIIT (High Intensity Interval Training). 
Seat Adjustment 
The knob under the seat adjusts the seat forward and backward. The lower knob adjusts the seat’s height so you’re comfortable while you work out. 
Transportability 
When not in use, easily transport the Circuit Fitness Upright Bike AMZ-594U by grabbing the handlebars handle, tilting the unit, and using the transport wheels located at the front of the unit.

features: 【HEAVY-DUTY MATERIAL, STABLE & SAFE】The SLUNSE upgraded home exercise bike features thickened aluminum steel construction with a curved rear base for exceptional durability and stability. Its ergonomic triangular frame design, with 35lbs flywheel, dual 7-shaped brake knobs, and 5pcs adjustable non-slip feet pads provide stabilizing support to ensure firmness and no wobbling on different surface. The max weight capacity is up to 350 lbs, making your workout safer and more reliable.

【FULLY ADJUSTABLE, THOUGHTFUL DESIGN】The indoor bike features a 2-way adjustable non-slip handlebar and a 4-way adjustable seat, the height and fore and aft can be freely adjusted, This workout bike suitable for users with height ranges from 4'8'' to 6'4''. The high-rebound soft seat cushion ensures comfort and correct posture during long rides. Aluminum alloy pedals with adjustable straps and nuts at the connections prevent breaking or falling off, making cycling more comfortable and safe.

【DATA TRACKING, PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE】Exercise bikes with multi-functional LCD monitor can record your time, speed, distance, calorie consumption, and odometer data in detail to help you track your fitness progress in real time, which can help you exercise more scientifically. Adjustable tablet holder and water bottle holder are designed to assist you can watching video lessons to enjoy entertainment and timely hydration, providing a professional and comfortable exercise experience.

【MAGNETIC RESISTANCE, QUIET & SMOOTH】Equipped with the latest magnetic resistance system, our stationary bikes for home offers precise adjustments and even stable friction for smoother riding. Unlike traditional wool felt resistance, this magnetic system requires no brake pad replacements and produces no friction noise. Combined with a maintenance-free belt drive controlling the sound at 25dB, more silent during exercise, ideal for home or office use without disturbing others.

【MICRO-ADJUSTMENT RESISTANCE, PRECISE CONTROL】Spinning Bike with 100-level micro-adjustment magnetic resistance. The intuitive resistance knob allows precise control of cycling intensity, meeting the training needs of both beginners and advanced users. Smooth and stable resistance brings you together to experience the fun of riding from flat ground to hills, enhancing cardiovascular function and muscle strength. The Emergency brake stops the flywheel immediately, ensuring safe performance.

【EASY TO ASSEMBLE, QUALITY SERVICE】SLUNSE refined exercise bike's transport wheels design allows you to move the cycling bike from one room to another easily, and even push it outdoors for use. With 80% pre-assembly, setup takes only 20-25 mins. It comes with detailed instructions and a tool kit. The 24-hour after-sales service is always ready to solve your problems. Whether home fitness or professional training, we're confident that the SLUNSE cardio stationary bike is the ideal choice for you.

title: YAMO Exercise Bike, Indoor Cycling Bike Brake Pad/Magnetic Stationary Bike for Home, Adjustable Resistance Silent Belt Drive, Cycle Bike with Comfortable Seat Cushion & Upgraded LCD Monitor
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Exercise Bikes
features: MORE STABLE AND SAFER - The frame of our exercise bike is crafted from high-strength steel, with multiple triangular support structures and a 15 lbs heavy duty cast iron flywheel ensuring stability during rides. Even at full sprint, it offers a safe and reliable training experience.

FULLY ADJUSTABLE - The Spring pull pins allow for easy adjustment of handlebar and seat positions. The handlebars are adjustable in two directions (up and down), and the seat is adjustable in four (up, down, fore, and aft), fitting users with a height of 5 ft to 6.2 ft. With an infinite resistance knob, you can freely adjust the intensity of your workout. One exercise bike meets the workout needs of your entire family.

SILENT AND SMOOTH - Our cutting-edge stationary bike features a silent magnetic control system, noise-free bearings, and a self-generating power system that eliminates electrical hum. Experience a smooth, quiet ride that allows you to focus on your workout without distractions. Elevate your fitness journey with innovation and tranquility.

LCD MONITOR AND TABLET HOLDER - The LCD monitor tracks speed, distance, calories, ODO, and RPM, so that you can know your progress and adjust your exercise plan in time. The tablet holder accommodates phones, iPads, or other devices, making your workout more enjoyable.

USER-FRIENDLY DESIGN - This exercise bike comes equipped with a water bottle holder and a dumbbell rack, allowing you to hydrate and engage in diverse training. The resistance knob allows for emergency braking, and the transport wheels help you easily move the bike.

QUICK AND EASY ASSEMBLY - Experience the convenience of setting up your exercise bike with ease. Your package arrives with a comprehensive instruction manual and all the necessary tools. We've designed the assembly process to be so straightforward that you can have your exercise bike ready to ride in just 30 minutes.

SPACE-SAVING - Our Indoor stationary bike is compact in size, covers only 5.9 square feet of space -- perfect for your home gym! Engineered for efficiency, it's designed to fit seamlessly into any room without compromising on performance. Enjoy a full-body workout with minimal footprint. Get ready to pedal your way to health!

Digital Monitor＆ Tablet Holder

title: JOROTO X2|X2PRO Exercise Bike, X4S Bluetooth Stationary Indoor Cycling Bike with Readable 100 Levels Magnetic Resistance, Plus 12.6 inch Tablet Bracket Exercise Bikes for Home
inStockText: In Stock  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Exercise Bikes
features: 【Why was X2PRO born?】- JOROTO has been serviced for over 30 million families worldwide in three decades, we always put customers' experience as first priority, and X2PRO Bluetooth exercise bike with magnetic resistance and belt drive are designed and improved based on the customer’s suggestion for JOROTO X2. This stationary bikes for home can fulfill the different cycling exercise demands from beginner to enthusiast.

【Full Readable Digital monitor】- The digital monitor of this magnetic stationary bike is self-developed, it not only shows the TIME, SPEED, DISTANCE, CALORIES but also shows LOAD ( magnetic resistance levels from 1% to 100%), WATT, RPM( cadence). What’s more, it has a Bluetooth function, allowing users to connect to the APP to do cycling classes.

【Unique Updated Designs】- ① Unique 12.6” enlarged tablet bracket, it can support objects from mini to big such as mobile, books, tablets, and laptops; ② Unique resistance and urgent stop system, 5 stronger magnets to create magnetic resistance and extra leather brake pad to make urgent stop safer, and won’t affect the magnetic resistance in the normal cycling workout.

【Sturdy, Stable, and Safe】- The AV type frame, 35lbs chromed flywheel, 50mm thickened frame tube and updated 300lbs max user weight give this indoor bike a rock solid build. With 4 horizontal adjustment knobs under the front and rear stabilizer to keep the bike stable on different surfaces, X2PRO fitness exercise bikes will provide you a safer riding.

【Fully Adjustable for Whole Family】- The wide seat and handlebar are both 4-way adjustable to fit all the family members with different heights (Suitable inseam: Max 36.2" -Min 27.5"). The steel toe-caged pedals are designed with adjustable straps, they can fit different sizes of feet well. There is also a convenient adjustable knob, with a simple twist, you can adjust the resistance to fulfill different workout plans.

【30 DAYS EXTENDED KINOMAP SUBSCRIPTION】Joroto has developed a deep cooperation with Kinomap - One of the Top Training Apps on market! Joroto offers an Extended 30 Days Kinomap Subscription for Joroto trainers, with the 14-day trial period you will be able to use all functions and join all courses in Kinomap for 44 days in total with no cost! Contact Joroto after purchase to get the Kinomap activation code!

【Buy JOROTO with Confidence】- This X2PRO indoor cycling bike's shipping weight is 102 lbs, itself weighs 92 lbs while its flywheel weighs 35 lbs, which is much heavier than other brands. For all JOROTO bikes, the measurement and capacity are the actual results, NOT a mendacious number! The package included installation tools. The brand-new bike has 1-year without any costs replacement parts! Customer support team response within 24 hours! Satisfied solution if any issue!

title: Foldable Exercise Bike for Small Apartments, Lightweight Stationary Bikes for Home, Indoor Portable Cycling Bike with 16-Level Magnetic Resistance, 260LBS Capacity, 5.5 LBS Flywheel, Designed for Small Space Workout 816 White

features: 16-LEVEL MAGNETIC RESISTANCE SYSTEM: Our exercise bike allows for 16 levels of resistance adjustment and 20 dB silent ride. That's because it utilizes a non-friction magnetic resistance system that takes advantage of silent and smooth resistance adjustments.Multiple levels of resistance to meet the workout needs of beginners to professionals. and he low decibel ride keeps you from disturbing others.

70% PRE-ASSEMBLED & SAVING 30% TIME: The portable bike you get is almost 70% assembled.You only need to install the mainframe, handlebars, monitor, pedals, seat and bike feet as well as very few screws. The entire process takes less than an hour. Clear instructions and videos make assembly effortless for anyone. With clear, comprehensive instruction and an accompanying installation video, you'll have your bike set up in no time, regardless of your technical proficiency.

SCIENTIFIC STRUCTURE 260LBS CAPACITY: The max weight capacity of this exercise bike is 260 lbs. It uses high quality steel and is designed with a double golden triangle frame that is stronger and more stable than other bikes.Our exercise bike for seniors is also equipped with an ergonomic and highly resilient cushion, so your butt won't hurt no matter what kind of body type you are, even if you ride for a long time!

ADJUSTABLE AND SUITABLE FOR 4'11''-6'6'': This indoor exercise bike has 5 level adjustable seat height.It is suitable for a height range of 4'11''-6'6''. This is perfect for home that have different body types.They can all share the use of the exercise bike. And the front and back support tubes can be fine-tuned in 6 levels, which can perfectly deal with uneven floors.
WHAT YOU GET: X-Bike 816 White, Product manuals, A small packet of installation tools, Our 12-month commitment of carefree protection, friendly customer service and telephone message service.

REAL-TIME FITNESS DATA: The stationary bike can record your fitness data including pulse rate, calorie, time, distance, speed. These data will be displayed on LCD screen. And the work out data can auto start and auto close, As long as you start to ride immediately automatically record the exercise data, and it will turn off automatically after you stop using it for a few minutes.

features: 5-IN-1 MULTI-FUNCTIONAL EXERCISE BIKE: With just a simple height adjustment, you can transition between three unique riding positions: Upright-Competitive for an intense cardio workout, Semi-Recumbent for a more relaxed ride, and Upright-Standard for the classic cycling experience. But that's not all. This bike also boasts dual hand pull cords for effective arm stretches and dual leg pull cords for strengthening your lower body.

16-LEVEL MAGNETIC RESISTANCE SYSTEM: Elevate your workout with our bike's 16-level magnetic resistance system! Featuring four high-grade magnets and a 5.5-pound aluminum-rimmed flywheel, the indoor bike offers incredibly smooth resistance adjustments that are whisper-quiet during use. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned athlete, you'll find the perfect challenge to push your limits.
ULTRA-QUIET 20dB RIDING: At home, silence is gold during workouts. Our bike features a high-quality flywheel & braided elastic band for minimal friction noise, ensuring a peaceful ride (<20dB)

PRE-ASSEMBLED 70% & SAVING 30% INSTALLATION TIME: The portable exercise bike you get is almost 70% assembled.You only need to install the mainframe, handlebars, monitor, pedals, seat and bike feet as well as very few screws. The entire process takes less than an hour. Clear instructions and videos make assembly effortless for anyone. It enables you to enjoy a riding experience faster.

IMPORTANT DETAILS: (1) This workout bike is suitable for riders ranging from 4'11" to 6'6" tall, accommodating a max weight of 300 pounds. (2) The cycling bike folds completely for compact storage, and comes with wheels for seamless transportation. (3) Boasting an LCD display, the folding bike keeps track of key stats like time, speed, and calories burned. Plus, it includes a handy phone holder for entertainment while you work out.
What You Get: X-Bike 817, Product manuals, A small packet of installation tools, Our 12-month commitment of carefree protection, friendly customer service and telephone message service.

features: 🥰【BLUETOOTH CONNECTIVITY】Step into the immersive world of virtual cycling with exercise bike, seamlessly compatible with Kinomap and Zwift. Transform your home into a dynamic cycling arena.

🥰【STABILITY REDEFINED】Crafted with reinforced Carbon Steel frame tubes, the indoor cycling bike boasts a solid build that conquers the instability issues common in many stationary bikes. Experience a ride without any wobbling or creaking, whether you're cycling seated or standing.

🥰【MAGNETIC MAGIC】Revolutionize your workout with magnetic resistance. Through the ingenious use of magnets, our bike ensures a silent and smooth operation. The flywheel dances effortlessly, whispering through your workout. Paired with a belt drive, the bike guarantees minimal maintenance.

🥰【CUSTOMIZED WORKOUTS】Tailor your workout to your preferences. Adjust the handle and seat height to accommodate users of different sizes. The toe-caged pedals, complete with adjustable straps, cater to various foot sizes. Make exercise a family affair with yoyomax, where everyone can join in and stay fit.

title: Foldable Exercise Bike Stationary Bike, Sportneer 4 in 1 Indoor Cycling Bike with 16 Level Magnetic Resistance Training Bike with Arm Resistance Band PVC Floor Mat Fitness Bike for Home Gym Workout
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Exercise Bikes
features: 4-IN-1 Folding Exercise Bike for Home Workout : Sportneer Fitness Bike gives you three types of indoor exercise bikes: Upright, Semi-recumbent and Recumbent foldable home workout bike. Additionally, this bike comes with arm resistance bands to help tone your upper muscles and provide a complete body workout.

Super Quiet : Sportneer indoor slim cycle exercise bike takes safety seriously! 5.5lb quiet flywheel and PVC floor mat provide stabilization of your training equipment, keeping your movements smooth and quiet while protecting your floor for you to ride freely.

16 Magnetic Resistance Levels : The 16 magnetic resistance levels of the Stationary Exercise Bike is the star of the show. These resistance levels allow for the customization of your exercise plan, ranging from warm-up to strenuous training. The 7 adjustable heights and 240lbs weight support mean that you can ramp up your workout.

Comfortable & Easy To Assemble : Sportneer folding exercise bikes for home comes equipped with a backrest and an ergonomic saddle expertly crafted from a high-density sponge for extra comfort and very easy to assemble. (Please note: If you meet problems when using the product, please consult us, we will do our best and be glad to help you solve any problems.)

Compact Design & Easy to Move : The folding exercise bike is extremely suitable for the small living room because it doesn't take up too much space. And it can be fully folded up to occupy minimal space for storage when not in use. It comes with transport wheels for you to move this exercise bike easily from room to room in your home gym.

LCD Monitor with iPad Holder : The Sportneer folding exercise bike is for you as it lets you know your speed, time, distance, calories expended, and heart rates during your workout sessions. A tablet device holder attached makes watching video on your iPad or phone available while exercising.

Great Value Present for Seniors, Parents : Compared with exercise bikes, Sportneer X-Bike is the more suitable present for parents' health. It has more adjustments, less noise, takes up less space, simpler installation methods, more portable folding storage functions, and a more stable support structure. Ideal for physical therapy and calorie burning of men, women and seniors.

description: The all NEW Assault Air Bike is a modernly designed take on a very old traditional air resistance bike. Fixing everything that was wrong and implementing new technology. Strengthening all pivot points and upgrading them with bearings instead of bushings to provide a powerfully smooth operation. Work out with no limits due to the unlimited resistance provided by air. Power your legs and arms faster or slower to determine your resistance. Monitor time, distance, calories, watts, RPMs, speed with the on board smart computer console. Includes Motivating programs, like Tabata Intervals, which help build up strength and stamina or choose the Heart Rate monitoring program to monitor your pulse and build up your aerobic base. All this is wrapped up in a frame that can take the abuse and dish it out too. Transport Handle and water bottle holder with water bottle included.
features: Twenty Sealed Ball Bearings throughout the frame and pivot points to provide a smooth and durable feel
Unlimited Resistance for upper and lower body extremities based on Air Resistance; Get a complete Cross-Fit Workout
Computer features motivational programs providing many programs (Tabata, Intervals, Watts, Heart Rate) to accomplish your fitness goals
Maximum user weight: 350 pounds . Twenty Five inch diameter steel fan delivers maximum resistance, with six way adjustable seat fore and aft, up and down and tilt. Square-tapered design
Set a calorie, distance, or time target goal with the advanced computer display ; Integrated messaging to help inspire you keeps the workout fresh
