title: Recumbent Exercise Bike, Recumbent Stationary Bike for Home, Recumbent Bike with 400LB Weight Capacity Whisper-Quiet 16 Levels Magnetic Resistance Heart Rate Handle and Multi-Function LCD Comfortable Seat
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Exercise Bikes
description: Welcome to XVGVSV, where innovation meets fitness. With a commitment to quality and customer satisfaction, XVGVSV is dedicated to bringing you premium exercise equipment that enhances your fitness journey.Introducing the XVGVSV Recumbent Exercise Bike, your ultimate companion for achieving fitness goals from the comfort of your home. Designed with precision and featuring advanced technology, this stationary recumbent bike offers a seamless indoor cycling experience that prioritizes comfort, performance, and durability.Product Function Detailed Explanation:The XVGVSV Recumbent Exercise Bike is equipped with magnetic resistance technology, ensuring smooth and quiet operation, making it ideal for home use. Its adjustable seat provides customizable comfort, catering to users of all sizes. The clear LCD display keeps you informed of your workout metrics, including time, speed, distance, calories burned, and heart rate, helping you track progress and stay motivated.This indoor recumbent bike is engineered for effective cardio workouts, promoting cardiovascular health and overall fitness. Whether you're a beginner or a fitness enthusiast, the XVGVSV bike offers low-impact exercise that is gentle on joints while providing a challenging workout session.Specification Information and Usage Instructions:1.16 magnetic resistance levels: easily adjusted to suit the intensity of your workout..2.Adjustable Seat: Ensures ergonomic comfort and proper posture during workouts.3.LCD Display: Provides real-time tracking of essential workout data.4.Built-in Pulse Sensors: Monitors your heart rate for effective training.5.Compact and Sturdy Design: Fits seamlessly into any home gym space.6.Weight Capacity: Supports up to 400 lbs.7.Dimensions: 48.3*25.4*45.3in8.Assembly: Quick and easy assembly with included instructions.9.Usage: Perfect for daily fitness routines, rehabilitation, and maintaining health goals.Additional Information:For optimal performance and safety, please read the user manual before use. Keep children and pets away from the equipment during operation. The XVGVSV Recumbent Exercise Bike is designed for indoor use only.Transform your fitness journey with the XVGVSV Recumbent Exercise Bike today. Whether you're looking to improve cardiovascular health, tone muscles, or simply stay active, our bike is your trusted partner in achieving your fitness aspirations. Experience the difference with XVGVSV—where quality meets performance.
features: 🎄【Enhanced Comfort with Customizable Seating】 Our recumbent exercise bike is designed to maximize comfort with a high-density cushioned seat and backrest. The easy-to-use seat adjustment lever allows you to quickly and effortlessly find your ideal seating position, ensuring a comfortable and supportive workout experience for users of all heights.Designed with a high-density cushioned seat and ergonomic backrest, it provides maximum support for seniors and adults alike.

🔇【Silent and Sturdy Construction for Lasting Stability】 Built with high-quality commercial-grade steel, our recumbent stationary bike offers exceptional durability, supporting users up to 400 lbs. Its solid construction ensures a stable workout environment for all fitness levels. Featuring advanced magnetic resistance technology, this recumbent bikes perfect for seniors and adults to exercise at home without disturbing family holiday festivities.

🎁 【Effortless Setup and Portability】 Designed for convenience, our recumbent bike with up to 85% of the pre-assembled, ensuring that setup is quick and hassle-free—usually taking just about 30 minutes. Additionally, the integrated front wheels allow you to easily move the stationary bike from one room to another, making it a perfect fit for any home gym setup.

🎄【Versatile Resistance Levels for Optimal Efficiency】 Offering 16 levels of resistance, our recumbent exercise bike provides a wide range of workout intensities, making it suitable for beginners and professionals alike. Whether you're warming up, running body-building exercises, or engaging in fat-burning workouts, you can easily adjust the resistance to match your fitness level. It's an excellent option for anyone looking for versatile stationary exercise bikes for home use, ensuring you achieve your fitness goals efficiently.

📊【Advanced LCD Display with Heart Rate Monitoring】 Exercise bike for home with comprehensive LCD screen provides real-time tracking of essential workout data, including time, speed, distance, calories, odometer readings, and heart rate. The built-in pulse sensors allow for precise heart rate monitoring, helping you optimize your exercise routine for better results.

🎄【XVGVSVC Assurance and Ongoing Support】 We are dedicated to ensuring your satisfaction with our recumbent stationary bikes. We back our product with a 12-month parts replacement guarantee and offer responsive 24-hour customer service, giving you confidence in your purchase and ongoing support throughout your fitness journey.

🎅 【The Perfect Christmas Gift for All Ages】Looking for the perfect Christmas gift? Our recumbent exercise bike is an excellent choice for seniors and family members of all ages. With its adjustable seat, 16 resistance levels, and low-impact workout design, it's ideal for improving fitness and promoting healthy living. Whether for a parent, grandparent, or loved one, this bike provides a comfortable, customizable workout for every family member to enjoy

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Stamina Mini Exercise Bike with Smooth Pedal System 
The Stamina Pedal Exerciser is a compact cycle that provides an effective, efficient seated cardio exercise. You can use the peddler exerciser to work on your lower or upper body, even while reading or watching TV. Simply set it on the ground in front of the couch or under a table or desk and begin pedaling. For an upper-body workout, set the minibike on a table, grab the pedals with your hands and begin rotating. The unique Smooth Pedal System utilizes gears instead of cranks, making your workout on the exercise peddler smoother than ever before. 
Stationary Bike for Everyone | Pedal with feet or hands 
The stability and support of this exercise bike make it an excellent floor pedal exerciser for everyone, including seniors. Your strokes will remain smooth even when you increase the resistance with the easy-to-reach dial. The smooth pedal system and rubber non-slip end caps reduce skidding when the resistance is high. 
Under Desk Bike and Pedal Exerciser 
Work on your lower and upper body with complete comfort and convenience. This mini exercise bike features: 
· Textured pedals with straps for security. 
· Smooth, easy-to-reach dial resistance. 
· Compact design that fits easily just about anywhere. 
· Non-slip rubber frame caps. 
· Scanning multi-function workout monitor that tracks workout time, stroke count and calories burned. The monitor also tilts to adjust to your view. 
Experience connected fitness with this home gym equipment with the müüv app. With smart guided coaching, exercise demo videos, personalized workouts, assembly videos, and more, müüv provides the best workout and fitness experience with your Stamina equipment. Download the müüv app on the Apple App Store or the Google Play store.

title: Sunny Health & Fitness Pro Cycling Stationary Bike, 40 LB Flywheel & 4-Way Adjustable Seat for Home Exercise & Indoor Cycle/Cardio Workout, Optional Free SunnyFit App Bluetooth Connection
inStockText: Only 15 left in stock (more on the way).
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Exercise Bikes
description: Start an in-home cardio workout with the SF-B901 Pro Indoor Cycling Bike by Sunny Health & Fitness. Tailor your workout with the four-way adjustable seat and two-way adjustable handlebars, which are designed around comfort and performance. Feel confident and secure when you slide your feet into the universal toe cages on the stationary bike. Enjoy a smooth and challenging workout experience when you pedal against the consistent chain-drive mechanism using the large muscles of your hips and thighs. Maintain cycling momentum on the fitness bike with the sturdy 40-pound chrome flywheel. Switch up your routine and easily change cycling position on the home exercise bike with the multi-grip handlebars. Increase workout resistance smoothly, effectively, and quietly with the micro-adjustable dual felt-pad resistance. Designed with heavy-duty metal, this bike supports a maximum user weight of 275 lb. After you workout, move the indoor cycling bike across your home with the built-in transportation wheels. Build a strong cardiovascular system while you burn calories on the Sunny Health & Fitness SF-B901 Pro Indoor Cycling Bike.
features: 【40 LB FLYWHEEL】The 40 LB chrome flywheel is engineered to provide exceptional stability and riding momentum, ensuring challenging workouts that engage your muscles and promote a smoother, more effective exercise experience.

【FREE CONNECTED APP】 Enjoy FREE access to the SunnyFit App with every Sunny Health & Fitness product—no membership fees! Dive into 1,000+ trainer-led workouts, explore 10,000+ virtual scenic tours, track your progress, challenge others, and much more!

【QUIET OPERATION】The belt-drive mechanism offers a virtually maintenance-free solution. Its whisper-quiet operation allows you to exercise without disturbing others, creating a peaceful and uninterrupted workout environment.

【STEPLESS RESISTANCE & SAFETY】Effortlessly adjust your workout intensity with the micro adjustable resistance knob. The dual felt pad resistance system allows seamless adjustments, and for quick stops, simply push down the resistance knob.

【PERSONALIZED COMFORT】Easily adjust multi-grip handlebars and a two-way seat to match your riding style and leg inseam length (adjustable inseam height: Max. 41 in / Min. 29 in), ensuring a comfortable and customized cycling experience.

【ROBUST & STABLE】The heavy-duty steel frame provides a solid foundation, allowing you to confidently engage in any cycle-based workout. With a weight capacity of up to 275 LB, this frame ensures stability and durability.

【PERFORMANCE DIGITAL MONITOR】The LCD digital monitor tracks essential workout metrics, including time, speed, distance, calories burned, odometer readings, pulse rate, and RPM (revolutions per minute).

【ULTIMATE CONVENIENCE】Stay entertained with a device holder, stay hydrated with a bottle holder, and seamlessly switch to strength training with a dumbbell holder—all within easy reach, enhancing your workout experience.

【EFFORTLESS SETUP & MOBILITY】The bike offers easy assembly, allowing you to start your workouts quickly. With the transportation wheels, you can effortlessly move and store the bike as needed, making it a practical and versatile fitness solution.

【Sunny Health & Fitness Commitment】A top fitness brand for 20+ years, offers superior products and a dedication to excellence. Count on our committed customer service and enjoy peace of mind with a 1-year warranty on the structural frame.

breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Exercise Bikes
description: High Energy live classes with certified cycle instructors, keep you motivated from our amazing studio in Chattanooga, TN. Live and over 1,500 on demand rides, plus Zumba, Barre, Strength, Yoga, and more classes available on the Echelon Fit app.
features: Enjoy a FREE 30-day trial of the Echelon Premier Membership with access to more than 3,000 live and on-demand connected fitness classes led by the world's best instructors through the Echelon Fit App. Enjoy exclusive content, class playlists, and music from top record labels, including your favorite hits from artists like Pitbull, Old Dominion, Lady Gaga, Daddy Yankee, and more. Classes range from 5 to 45 minutes and are designed for everyone from beginner to pro athletes. Explore classes like Cycling, Rowing, Running, HIIT, Kickboxing, Strength Training, Yoga, Pilates, and more. One membership allows up to five users, so your friends and family can enjoy the Echelon experience together.

DESIGN: Pedal farther on the EX-5. Built with performance in-mind, this connected bike boasts a variety of features that will help you raise your cycling game. Whether your aim is to de-stress, train for a competition or anything in-between, you can count on the EX-5 to get you there.

FEATURES & PERFORMANCE: Aero handlebars feature ergonomic design to help align your upper body for optimum performance. - 32 levels of silent magnetic resistance lets you vary your workout intensity – Handlebar mounted 180 degree rotating console lets you incorporate off bike exercises – 6” lever makes it easy to adjust the seat position fit any body - Fully adjustable toe cages on the pedals for a secure fit - Extra-large cushioned seat offers comfortable riding - Powder-coat frame for resistance to scratches - Padded handlebars are slip-resistant.

CONTENT: With a membership you get live and on-demand classes for beginning to advanced riders ranging from 5-45 minutes long. Choose from endurance, climbing, HIIT, scenic rides and many others from our world class instructors. One membership works for all machines, including our bikes, rowers, treadmills and Reflect fitness mirrors. You also get access to our Fitpass programs which include yoga, strength, pilates, boxing and much more!

MUSIC: We Don't Play Elevator Music! With a membership, you'll stay energized and motivated with the best music in the industry. We partner with the top record labels to bring you the latest music for the best fitness experience. Dance, EDM, Folk and Funk. Hip Hop to K-Pop. Metal, Latin and R&B...whatever your ears want, we've got!

features: Extra Cushion Ventilated Saddle: Experience unparalleled comfort with our wide, padded sport seat designed for optimal support. The extra cushioning and ventilated zones ensure airflow, reducing sweat buildup and keeping you cool during intense workouts. Dual rubber pillars enhance shock absorption for a smoother ride.

Larger Tablet & Bottle Holder: Stay entertained and hydrated with dual cup holders on the handlebars, fitting bottles up to 3.2 inches in diameter. The extra-wide tablet mount holds devices up to 12.9", keeping your essentials within reach.

Durability & Stability: Built with high-carbon steel and a triangular structure, this exercise bike offers superior durability and stability, supporting up to 300 lbs. The micro-adjustable tension system, ranging from 0 to 100 levels, allows for a customized workout experience, while the belt-driven system ensures a smooth and quiet ride.

Adjustable Seat, Post & Handlebar: Perfect for riders of nearly any size (4'8” to 6'5”), the CURSOR FITNESS stationary bike features a 4-way adjustable seat with 7 vertical settings (7.9”) and multiple horizontal levels (4.4”). The handlebar offers 5 vertical adjustment levels (4.8”), making it suitable for the whole family.

10-Minute Daily Fat Burn: Achieve your fitness goals with just 10 minutes of daily exercise. The built-in LCD monitor tracks key metrics like Time, Speed, Calories, Heart Rate, and Distance in real-time, ensuring an efficient and effective workout.

CursorCare Service: Enjoy peace of mind with a 5-year warranty on the frame structure and a 1-year warranty on parts. Our Los Angeles-based CursorCare service team provides 24/7 support to guarantee 100% satisfaction, ensuring a worry-free shopping and usage experience.

For added convenience, it includes a 2-in-1 tablet holder and a water bottle holder, allowing you to enjoy entertainment or stay hydrated while you ride. Designed for seniors, adults, and the entire family, this bike makes cardio workouts fun and easily accessible for everyone.

Fully Adjustable Recumbent Bike: This HARISON exercise bike is equipped with a spacious, adjustable seat (11.4" x 15.7") designed for ultimate home comfort. Padded with high-density foam, the seat and backrest provide essential support for your hips and back, encouraging proper posture while maximizing comfort. Its sliding seat rail system easily adjusts to fit users from 4'8" to 6'4", ensuring a comfortable leg position for effective workouts.

Magnetic Recumbent Exercise Bike for Seniors: The HARISON recumbent bike is built for convenience, featuring transport wheels and a lifting handle for effortless mobility, making it especially suitable for seniors. Its sturdy steel construction ensures outstanding stability and safety, giving you confidence with every workout.

Recumbent Bike for Home Gym: The HARISON recumbent bike provides a comfortable, reclined seating position, making it perfect for seniors, those with joint issues, or individuals recovering from injuries. It helps lower the risk of heart disease and improves cardiovascular endurance. Additionally, it targets and strengthens key lower body muscle groups while supporting weight loss, making it an outstanding fitness solution for the whole family.

30-Day No-Cost Trial & 1-Year Warranty: HARISON recumbent exercise bike includes a 30-day no-cost trial and a 1-year warranty for your peace of mind. We are dedicated to providing high-performance premium features in our product, ensuring exceptional value for your investment. Our experienced team is dedicated to providing evidence of our commitment every day!

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Marcy ME-709 Magnetic Resistance Recumbent Exercise Bike 
Looking for an easy way to shed unwanted pounds and increase cardiovascular endurance without sacrificing precious floor space? The ME-709 magnetic recumbent exercise bike is the answer. 
With the ME-709, you will benefit from similar type exercise features that are typically offered on larger and more expensive exercise bikes. This recumbent exercise bike was built with a compact design that conveniently fits into the smallest exercise spaces. 
Shape, firm and tone your physique and increase your body’s cardiovascular endurance while burning calories and losing weight. 
Adjustable Seat 
The Marcy Recumbent Exercise Bike ME-709 seat can be adjusted so your legs get the proper stride as you pedal. 
LCD Computer Display 
The LCD Computer displays time, speed, distance, calories, and odometer (total distance.) Use the metrics to keep track of your progress. 
Adjustable Resistance 
A convenient resistance knob located under the handles bars makes it easy to change resistance during your workouts. 
Recumbent Handlebars 
The recumbent handlebars and seat back pad included with the Marcy Recumbent Exercise Bike ME-709 provide comfort during your long bike rides. 
Pedals with Safety Straps 
The Marcy Recumbent Bike has large textured pedals to safely grip your feet as you pedal. In addition, the pedal straps ensure your feet won’t slip off the pedals during intense rides. 
Transport Wheels 
To easily move your Marcy ME-709 Recumbent Exercise Bike, tilt the unit on to the transport wheels and move around as needed.

title: Exercise Bike, DMASUN Classic Brake Pad Pro Stationary Bike for Home with 330 LB Capacity, Workout Bike with Comfortable Seat Cushion, Digital Display with Tablet Holder
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Exercise Bikes
features: DISCOVER DMASUN: DMASUN is a professional sports brand that seamlessly integrates the design, production, sales, and service of sports products. With over 30 years of experience, our products are widely distributed across the United States, Canada, Japan, Britain, Germany, and other countries. We have successfully delivered fitness products to more than 2 million households. This is a brand you can trust.

HOW CAN WE ENHANCE STABILITY AND SECURITY? The DMASUN exercise bike is equipped with a 40 LB fully filled solid flywheel and alloy steel that is thicker than other products (over 2 mm thick), ensuring a sturdy construction for a smooth ride. Users who weigh more than 350 LB can also use it with confidence. The products have been tested for anti-fall before leaving the factory, so they are of higher quality and more secure.

JUST HOW QUIET AND SMOOTH ARE DMASUN EXERCISE BIKES? After testing, the sound produced by our stationary bikes does not exceed 20 dbs, providing an almost silent advantage that will bring you an immersive exercise experience without worrying about disturbing those around you. The rugged ABS pulley ensures smooth belt transmission and years of riding without belt breakage and wear.

RESISTANCE LEVELS VARY FROM EASY TO DIFFICULT: This workout bike features updated magnetic resistance, no squeaking of wool felt pads and no maintenance, and offers a wider adjustable range of resistance, with levels ranging from 0-20% for warm up, 20%-50% for running, 50%-80% for fat burning, 80%-100% for muscle strengthening. This 0-100% variation in resistance aligns with the daily exercise programs of individuals at different stages.

APP TAILORED TRAINING PLANS: DMASUN's new upgraded version of the indoor bike can be connected to the APP via Bluetooth with Kinomap and Zwift for virtual training, racing, and challenges. Making it easy for you to track your progress with real-time metrics such as distance, time, calories, average BPM, and more. Provide the best experience for cycling enthusiasts (Attention: without LCD display).

EFFORTLESS AND USER-FRIENDLY BIKE: The DMASUN sports bike is equipped with an electronic device stand, water bottle holder, non-slip caged pedals, transport wheels, and level adjustment knobs. It features four-way seat adjustment and two-way handlebar adjustment to accommodate users ranging from 4.8 ft to 6.3 ft in height. DMASUN This exercise bike uses a unique round steel stability tube with four non-slip foot covers, which has obvious advantages in terms of stability.

INSTALLATION IN 30 MINUTES: To ensure our customers can quickly start using our bikes, 70% of the installation has been pre-completed. Watch the installation video, and the remaining components can be easily installed within 30 minutes. You will only need to install the handlebar, seat, front and rear stability tubes, and pedals; The frame, flywheel, and crank are all pre-assembled.

WE CHERISH EVERY CUSTOMER: We provide 12 months warranty. We constantly collect questions raised by customers and continue to optimize, if you have any questions, please contact us, and the factory engineer video provides professional guidance. Double guarantee of quality and service. Your inquiries will be addressed within 18 hours.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Exercise is so easy , so convenient, for any people at home or at office ! 
We are committed to providing the perfect exercise equipment to our customers, We have been engaged in this industry for 10 years. We know what kind of products are better and meet the needs of consumers perfectly. In response to customer feedback issues, we are constantly improving this product. 
SMART EXERCISE BIKE FOR LEG AND ARM 
LEG EXERCISE 
Improve the muscles of thighs and calves,stimulate whole body blood circulation,also great for knee recovery exercise, especially after a knee surgery. 
ARM EXERCISE 
It is great for joint and muscle exercise,enhance joint flexibility of shoulder,elbow and wrist,prevent muscle rigidity,stimulate blood circulation . 
UNDER DESK EXERCISE BIKE 
After long time working,you need to relax,pedal the bike to do some light exercise to activate your leg, stimulate your blood circulation,and improve your passion for your work. 
5 FUNCTIONAL MONITOR 
The bike can be folded to a small size, very easy to store in a small space. 
Highlight for MOMODA exercise bike 
RESISTANCE ADJUSTABLE 
The tension can be adjusted to offer a little resistance(don’t offer high resistance),it is perfect to do light exercise for leg and arm,great for rehab exercise for the elderly. 
FODLABLE DESIGN 
The bike can be folded to a small size, very easy to store in a small space. 
ADJUSTABLE FOOT STRAP 
The foot strap is adjustable ,it fit the most size of feet, You can pedal it barefoot, and you can also pedal it in your shoes. 
CRANK WRAPPED BY FOAM 
the crank would get hot after long time use,the bare crank will scald you if you tuch it .we used insulation foam to wrap the crank,then it will not scald you,it is safe to use.

features: Free Personalized AI Courses: Our exercise bike leverages advanced AI algorithms to generate tailored training programs based on your selected simulation scenarios. The AI intelligently adjusts resistance levels and body posture to replicate authentic uphill and downhill cycling experiences, ensuring you consistently train at your optimal level for more effective and enjoyable workouts.

Immersive Fitness Experience: Transform your home into a cycling adventure with scenic riding courses that replicate real-world landscapes. Experience iconic virtual settings such as highways, lakeside paths, and mountain roads, bringing the thrill of outdoor cycling indoors. This immersive environment keeps you engaged and motivated throughout your training sessions.

Diverse Training Programs: Designed to accommodate all fitness levels and goals, our exercise bike offers a comprehensive range of training options. From endurance-building workouts to explosive power sessions and simulated hill climbs, each program is meticulously crafted to challenge and enhance your fitness. Whether your aim is to boost stamina, build strength, or conquer virtual elevations, there's a customized workout ready to elevate your performance.

Flexible Resistance Options: Tailor your workout intensity with 36 levels of resistance for a personalized cycling experience. The bike features advanced magnetic resistance for smooth and silent adjustments, alongside AI-driven automatic resistance that dynamically responds during uphill or downhill simulations. For those who prefer manual control, options are available to ensure effective and efficient training.

Ergonomic Comfort for Endurance: Prioritizing comfort and performance, the bike features a generously cushioned saddle designed for long rides. With adjustable handlebars and saddle positions, it ensures an optimal fit for riders of all sizes. This thoughtfully designed exercise machine combines comfort with challenge, making every ride a seamless and enjoyable experience.

title: Wahoo KICKR HEADWIND Heartrate/Speed Controlled Cycling Fan for Indoor Bike Trainers, Stationary/Spin Bikes, Cross Training,Black
breadCrumbs: Home & Kitchen › Heating, Cooling & Air Quality › Household Fans › Floor Fans
description: HEARTRATE/SPEED CONTROLLED CYCLING FAN - KICKR HEADWIND is the first ever smart fan, designed with the cyclist in mind. Its Targeted Airflow Pattern mirrors the shape and position of a cyclist's body while riding. The KICKR HEADWIND is sensor controlled so as your speed or heart rate increases, so will the fan speed. There are also 4 manual speed settings should you want to set your own ideal airflow. With speeds of over 30 mph (48 kph), the KICKR HEADWIND will keep you cool during the toughest training sessions.
features: POWERFUL AIRFLOW - With wind speeds topping out at over 30 mph the KICKR HEADWIND will keep you cool during your hardest efforts.
TARGETED AIRFLOW PATTERN - Designed to mirror the shape and position of a cyclist's body while riding on a bicycle.

SENSOR BASED FAN SPEED CONTROL - Control the speed of your KICKR HEADWIND by pairing your ANT+ speed sensor, heart rate monitor, or smart trainer directly to the fan. As your speed or heart rate increases so will the fan speed.
APP BASED FAN SPEED CONTROL - Pair to the Wahoo App via Bluetooth for easy fan speed control at your fingertips.
4 MANUAL SPEEDS - Control the KICKR HEADWIND with a simple press of a button. Four (4) preprogrammed fan speeds allow you to select your ideal airflow.

KICKR ECOSYSTEM - KICKR HEADWIND is compatible with KICKR traners and accessories, including the KICKR CLIMB Grade Simulator, KICKR TRAINER FLOORMAT, and KICKR DESK. Build the ideal setup for your indoor cycling needs

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Wahoo Fitness 
Located in Atlanta, GA, Wahoo Fitness offers a full ecosystem of sensors, devices, and training software for runners, cyclists, and general fitness enthusiasts. Wahoo’s award-winning line of products include the KICKR family of smart indoor riding equipment and accessories, the ELEMNT family of GPS devices and sport watches, the TICKR family of heart rate monitors, as well as POWRLINK ZERO Power Pedals, SPEEDPLAY dual-sided road pedals, and the SYSTM and RGT training apps to help athletes unlock their potential and get the most out of the time they have to train. 
KICKR HEADWIND 
The first ever smart fan, designed with the cyclist in mind. Its Targeted Airflow Pattern mirrors the shape and position of a cyclist's body while riding. The KICKR HEADWIND is sensor controlled so as your speed or heart rate increases, so will the fan speed. There are also 4 manual speed settings should you want to set your own ideal airflow. With speeds of over 30 mph (48 kph), the KICKR HEADWIND will keep you cool during the toughest training sessions. 
SENSOR BASED FAN SPEED CONTROL 
Control the speed of your KICKR HEADWIND by pairing your ANT+ speed sensor, heart rate monitor, or smart trainer directly to the fan. As your speed or heart rate increases so will the fan speed. 
Build the ideal setup for your indoor cycling needs. 
RPM Speed & Cadence Sensors are compatible with Wahoo ELEMNT GPS Bike Computers and Wahoo KICKR indoor training accessories including the KICKR DESK, KICKR HEADWIND Smart Fan, and KICKR TRAINER FLOORMAT. Build the ideal setup for your indoor cycling needs.

features: 【4-IN-1 Exercise Bike】The upright posture of this bike provides you with high-intensity exercise and helps you burn more calories. The semi-recumbent posture with a low impact and more comfortable riding experience. This bike also comes with arm resistance bands, which helps to tone your upper muscles and your whole body workout.

【Folding Design & Easy to Move】The workout equipment for home is extremely suitable for the small living room because it doesn't take up too much space. And it can be fully folded up to occupy minimal space for storage when not in use. It comes with transport wheels for you to move this exercise bike easily from room to room at your home gym.

【Stable & Suitable】This fitness bike is made of thicker, higher quality steel, with a maximum load of 350 pounds. The stable triangle structure and adjustable height of this bike, that providing a very comfortable fitness experience. 4'11" to 6'3"

【16-Level Resistance】The upright indoor cycling bike provides you with more adjustable weight options. We use silent and smooth magnetic flywheels to make sure no abnormal noise when exercising at home. The 16-level magnetic resistance adjustment can meet your diverse needs.

【Best at Home Workout Equipment】Our stationary bike comes with LCD monitor, it tracks your time, speed, distance, calories burned, and heart rate while you are cycling--offers a scientific real-time exercise data. Place your phone/iPad on the holder and watch your favorite shows at the same time. Attached two strong Arm Resistance Bands to stretch your upper body.
【Workout Equipment for women】 Indoor exercise bike aims at improving the experience of home fitness, we use large and soft seat cushion to provide you with the most comfortable support.

title: Under Desk Elliptical Machine, Electric Leg Exerciser for Seniors, Compact Seated Pedal Exerciser, Portable Elliptical Trainer with Remote Control and Non-Slip Pedals for Teens Adults
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Elliptical Trainers
description: Rollingsurfer Elliptical Training Machine--The Best Gift for Parents, Family, and Friends Rollingsurfer Under Desk Elliptical Machine, a convenient and effective way to stay active throughout the day. This compact portable elliptical stepper is designed to fit seamlessly into your daily routine, offering a range of features to enhance your fitness experience. Our Seated Pedal Exerciser is perfect for users of all ages, providing a low-impact seated workout option that's gentle on joints yet effective in achieving fitness goals. With the ability to fit under most desks, this elliptical transforms your workspace into a dynamic environment, allowing you to exercise while working. Experience the convenience of Auto & Manual Mode with bi-directional motion, providing versatility in your workouts. Switch between modes effortlessly and target different muscle groups, all with the ease of use that our elliptical offers. The fully assembled design ensures that you can start exercising right out of the box.
features: 【Seated Pedal Exerciser, Senior Friendly】Designed for sedentary crowd, Rollingsurfer under desk elliptical machine enhances mobility, stimulates blood circulation, and strengthens lower body muscles. An optimal pedal exerciser for seniors, recovery enthusiasts, and sedentary office workers!

【Easy to use, Auto & Manual Mode 】Leg exercise machine compact elliptical offers 2 different modes depending on your needs. Auto Mode(P1-P3) and Manual Mode(HR) .The automatic mode(P1-P3) machine will change the direction and speed of rotation within 30 minutes. In manual mode, you can change the speed and direction of rotation you want within 30 minutes. (Rotate forward or backward. There are 5-levels speed(01-05) that can be changed , from 1.5KM/h to 5.7KM/h for your choice. )

【Upgrade Floating Point Particle Anti Slip Pedal】Shock absorption and anti slip foot pedals with floating particles can promote blood circulation in the soles of the feet and enhance joint flexibility. The circular motion trajectory of the compact and portable elliptical machine effectively relieves knee joint impact and protects knee soft tissue.Warm Tips: Wear socks or use barefoot for a better experience.

【Quiet and Smooth Workouts】Rollingsurfer leg exerciser has a steel flywheel and is equipped with a silent friction pad to provide a quiet experience for the user's movement. The X-shaped embedded anti slip integrated widened bottom plate design is more stable and safe, with smoother rotation. You can easily use it while working, watching TV or reading without disturbing your family or colleagues.

【Digital Display, Easy to Read】LCD display clearly shows your exercise data (time, distance, speed, calories, counter). Multi functional LCD screen touch usage and wireless remote control. Thoughtful remote design allows mode change without bending, reducing your back stress. Enjoy comfort with just one click.

【Fully Assembled, Easy storage】: Leg Exerciser do not require installation and is easy to use for the elderly. Lightweight, compact and saves space, making it easy to place in every small corner of the house. It can be easily moved from one room to another. This thoughtful design makes this mini elliptical ideal for seniors and people with limited mobility. The ultimate gift for your loved or friends ones!

【1 Year After-Sales Service】We provides 1-Year Manufacturer Warranty of desk elliptical. If you have any questions about our leg exercise machine, please let us know on time and describe your problem clearly. We have 24-hour dedicated email customer support and will provide you with a solution! Please don't hesitate to let us know through amazon!
【Warm Tips】Please do not use while standing, only when sitting. Standing on the device may cause serious injury and damage to the elliptical machine.

title: Stamina Wirk Ride Exercise Bike - Foldable Fitness Bike with Workstation and Standing Desk - Stationary Bike for Home Workout - Up to 250 Weight Capacity
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Exercise Bikes
description: Tough ChoicesWork or exercise? Both activities are monumentally important, but sometimes we neglect the exercise part. Don't you wish you could do both at the same time? Well, we've got you covered, friend. The WIRK Ride Workstation lets you pedal your way to better health while keeping your productivity high. You can also push the desktop to the forward to convert to a standing desk.A Place to WorkThe work surface (17.25"W x 10"D) provides a great place to set your laptop or super-secret documents. Or, if tablets are your thing, simply prop it up on the handy-dandy adjustable tablet holder to the angle that works for you. The molded cup holder keeps your drink nice and safe from your occasional clumsiness (or is that just us at Stamina?). The desktop also includes molded handles and a fitness monitor that tracks time, speed, distance, calories, total distance. It even has a scan function so that you don't have to fixate yourself on one stat.A Place to RideThe WIRK Ride has its name for a reason. The adjustable magnetic tension exercise bike makes it easy to work your leg muscles and elevate your heart rate. It has a super comfy padded seat and backrest because we actually want you to use it! The seat height is adjustable to fit your ideal pedaling position.Standing RoomIt turns out that sitting all day isn't good for you. Even if you are pedaling! So, we've come up with a way to let you use the Ride as a Stand-Up workstation as well. The desktop easily pushes away from the seat by pushing up on the release with your foot and gently pushing away. Then, stand up and get your WIRK on!
features: EXERCISE BIKE AND WORKSTATION - Our Stamina Wirk Ride Exercise Bike is a compact exercise bike that provides an effective, efficient seated cardio exercise. Even while working, reading, or watching TV, make cardio easy with our stationary bike.

WORKING STATION - This workout bike has a wide cushioned seat with a backrest to effectively provide support and comfort. This stationary bike also has a height-adjustable desk prop for a tablet or book, a laptop strap, and a built-in cupholder.

ULTRA QUIET MAGNETIC TENSION - This fitness bike offers adjustable, ultra-quiet magnetic pedaling tension to work your muscles and elevate your heart rate. The textured pedals with straps keep your feet in place while pedaling.

SPACE SAVING DESIGN - This durable, foldable stationary bike is designed with built-in wheels for easy storage and is ideal for users with limited space. Our fitness bike provides high-quality cardiovascular workouts in the comfort of your home.

SMART WORKOUT APP - Experience connected fitness with this home gym equipment with the müüv app. With smart guided coaching, exercise demo videos, personalized workouts, assembly videos, and more, müüv provides the best workout and fitness experience with your Stamina Bike.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Exercise Bike and Workstation 
The WIRK Ride Exercise Bike Workstation and Standing Desk is a compact exercise bike that provides an effective, efficient seated cardio exercise. It provides a great workout along with the features you need to maintain your productivity. Push the desktop forward to convert it to a standing desk. 
Even while working, reading, or watching TV, make cardio - and work - easy with our stationary bike. 
Ultra Quiet Stationary Bike 
Hop on the WIRK Ride for an effective cardiovascular and lower-body workout. This fitness bike offers adjustable, ultra-quiet magnetic resistance for a customized training experience. The adjustable magnetic tension makes it easy to work your leg muscles and elevate your heart rate. Aim for new heights using the multi-function workout monitor, which displays time, speed, calories, and total distance. While you're pedaling, the textured pedals, padded seat and molded hand grips increase your stability and comfort. 
Stand-Up Workstation 
The Wirk Ride Exercise Bike can be used as a Stand-Up workstation as well. Place your laptop or documents on the large work surface to continue working during exercise. Adjust the folding prop to hold up your tablet or smartphone at a suitable angle. Push the release to convert the tabletop to a standing desk. 
Space Saving | Foldable Bike 
After you're done exercising, fold the bike for easy storage. 
Experience connected fitness with this home gym equipment with the müüv app. With smart guided coaching, exercise demo videos, personalized workouts, assembly videos, and more, müüv provides the best workout and fitness experience with your Stamina equipment. Download the müüv app on the Apple App Store or the Google Play store.

Product Description
Lifepro FlexCycle Plus Bike 
At Lifepro, we believe our minds are the most powerful piece of equipment we own, which is why we’ve created a target approach to physical recovery that harnesses the body’s built-in repair and recovery mechanisms, activating its latent powers to accelerate recovery rates for those who believe, like we do, in taking an active role in gaining and recovering strength, momentum and the capacity to do more, achieve more, and get more out of life. 
PROGRESS & IMPROVE 
8 adjustable tension settings allow you to steadily increase resistance. 
FULL-BODY WELLNESS 
Aerobic exercise helps clear your mind while you build stamina and lean muscles. 
SUPPORT, START TO FINISH 
Training Videos + Everlasting Support for as long as you own your Flexcycle Plus. 
ADJUST TENSION 
Set your resistance level using the easy-read knob at the top. 8 levels available. 
SAFE & STABLE 
Non-slip grips + stabilizing bars included front and rear + optional tethering strep included for added safety on slippery floors. 
MONITOR STATS 
8 display options - including calories, speed, distance + more - so you can track what matters to you most. 
EASY-GRIP HANDLE 
Helps you move your bike to wherever you need it most, and store it away when you’re done.

features: 【WIDE APPLICATION】Compatible with Nordic Track S22I&S15I stationary bike.(Note:You can search for relevant information in the product description and verify the accuracy of the model by checking the label on the back of the control board.) Replace 430157 ,430146

【Pre-purchase Inspection】If there is a spare motor controller, you can replace the suspected damaged controller and then connect the motor and power supply for testing. If the motor works normally after replacement, the original controller is damaged; if the fault persists, there may be a problem with the motor or other components; Try to start the motor and observe the response of the motor, if the motor does not rotate, rotates slowly, rotates at an unstable speed, rotates with abnormal noise or jams, there may be a problem with the controller under the premise that there is no fault with the motor itself.
【EASY INSTALLATION】The advanced design allows the 430157 motor control board controller to be directly installed on your stationary bicycle, saving you time.

【RELIABLE PERFORMANCE】430146 Controller for Select Elliptical Machines is equipped with advanced systems to ensure smooth and efficient operation, while the durable structure is made of high-quality components, demonstrating long-lasting performance and reliability.

features: 【Upgraded Exercise Bike】 Constructed of heavy-duty steel, our indoor exercise bike with solid triangular frame has excellent performance in stability. 【Multi-position Adjustment】 Our exercise bike with 7-position adjustable handlebar is designed to provide an optimum riding experience. The seat can be moved horizontally and vertically as needed. Plus, the adjustable resistance design allows you to choose a suitable intensity according to your training plans. And the brake system increases your safety in an emergency.

【Simulating Real Cycling】 In order to provide a real cycling experience, this indoor exercise bike adopts 2 springs to simulate the swing of real movement. In addition, the anti-slip foot pads and adjustable cage-shaped pedals prevent unexpected wobbling or skidding during exercise.

【LCD Monitor & Device Holders】 Equipped with an LCD monitor, you can clearly know your sports data like time, distance, odometer, speed, pulse and calories burned during training. 【Easy to Assemble and Move】 Comes with clear installations and necessary hardware, you can complete the installation in a short time. 【Digital LED Monitor】Vanswe exercise bike is fitted with an LED monitor with backlight which is really bright and clear to read the numbers.The monitor records your heart rate, speed, distance travelled, time spent, and calories burnt, all data is double-calibrated by strict algorithms, allowing you to understand your exercise effects, formulate a more reliable exercise plan, and accomplish your exercise goals. 【Free App-Fitness Data】Vanswe workout bike also features Bluetooth Smart Technology which is compatible with iOS and Android systems. title: Sportneer Bike Trainer: Smart Stationary Bike Stand with Bluetooth 4.0 & ANT+ Connection - Bike Trainer Stand for 26-29" & 700C Wheels - Smart Bike Trainer Stand for Indoor Riding, Foldable Storage
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Sports › Cycling › Bike Trainers & Accessories › Resistance Trainers
features: Bluetooth & ANT+ Connectivity : Thanks to the Bluetooth 4.0 and ANT+ connection, pairing the Sportneer Smart Bike Trainer to your smart devices is a piece of cake! It's a match made in heaven with popular cycling apps like Zwift, Onelap, Powerfun, Rouvy AR, Onelap, Pertpro, ERCVideo, and many more.

Broad Compatibility: This smart trainer is as versatile as they come! It's compatible with smartphones, computers, tablets, Apple TV, and other smart devices. With its fully integrated sensors, it effortlessly detects power, speed, and cadence, and conveniently records this data on your smart device. Now you can experience renowned cycling routes around the globe, all from the comfort of your own home.

Pinpoint Technique: Equipped with electromagnetic resistance technology and thermal compensation calibration, this indoor bike trainer boasts an impressive power accuracy of 3%. It's built to handle up to 2000 watts of power and can automatically adjust resistance based on the slope, mimicking slopes of up to 15% during challenging climbs.

Work with Most Bike Models: The Sportneer Smart Bike Trainer is a perfect match for both road and mountain bikes, supporting wheel sizes of 26", 28", 29", or 700c. It accommodates rear axle widths ranging from 3' to 6.37'. It's important to note that the trainer includes a quick release skewer, so if you have a thru-axle bike, you'll need to purchase an adapter separately.

Quiet & Stable : The U-shaped structure, wide frame, anti-slip rubber feet, and dual locking knobs on the rear axle ensure unwavering stability. This smart bike trainer also features a sleek aluminum flywheel that keeps noise levels below 68 decibels, even at speeds up to 30 km/h.

Note: Noise levels may vary depending on the type of bike tire tread - the more aggressive the tread, the louder the noise. Therefore, it's recommended for road bikes, and if you have a mountain bike with rough tires, please purchase with caution.

title: Stamina Wonder Exercise Bike | Build Upper and Lower Body Strength on One Machine | Includes Two Online Workout Videos, Chartreuse and Gray
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Exercise Bikes
description: Designed for convenience, portability, and versatility, the Stamina Wonder Exercise Bike is a compact exercise bike that provides an effective, efficient cardio and muscle-toning workout. The Stamina Wonder Exercise Bike packs a workout that's good for the whole body. Engage your core and legs with this foldable workout bike that offers adjustable bike workout intensity. This foldable workout bike has an easy-to-reach tension dial for adjustable levels of magnetic resistance. This fitness bike comes with powerful, strength-training Wonder Arms with elastic bands that add upper-body resistance workout. The adjustable-angle arms allow multiple exercises that target your back, chest, shoulders, core, arms, and legs, including bicep curls, tricep extensions, lat raises, chest presses, leg kickbacks, and more. Tone your whole body with magnetic cycling resistance and bungee cord strength resistance. This home exercise bike includes textured pedals, padded hand grips, ergonomic handlebars, and a cushioned seat and backrest. The Wonder foldable exercise bike has a folding frame and built-in wheels for easy storage. Extra features help drive performance, including the multi-function LCD monitor, which tracks workout time, distance traveled, calories burned and speed. CONVENIENT SMART WORKOUT APP- This home gym equipment is fully supported by müüv, the all-in-one app that provides smart guided audio coaching, follow-along assembly videos, and personalized workouts, and helps you move 500+ minutes per month with the right mix of cardio, strength, and flexibility for a healthy and sustainable lifestyle. The all-in-one app comes with a follow-along assembly video, personalized workouts tailored to your strength training equipment, and an ad-free music listening experience from iHeartRadio. Download the müüv app on the Apple App Store or the Google Play store. Providing you with the best workout and fitness experience, get visible results, and track your progress with Stamina.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Stamina Wonder Exercise Bike | Convenience, Portability & Versatility 
Designed for convenience, portability and versatility, the Stamina Wonder Exercise Bike packs a workout that's good for the whole body. Engage your core and legs with the standard bike. When you're ready, take it to the next level with the included Wonder Arms. 
The Wonder Bike package includes an in-depth exercise guide, walking you through all of the most essential exercises that you can perform on your bike. 
Double the Workout, Double the Fun 
The Wonder Arms help strengthen and tone your arms, shoulders, chest and back. Thanks to the intuitive design and quick angle-adjusting arms, it's easy to execute exercises like chest press, curls, flies and more with the smooth combo bungee cord / pulley system. The soft, padded grips on the arms help to ensure comfort during your workouts. 
Compact Exercise Bike 
The Stamina Wonder Exercise Bike is a compact exercise bike that provides effective, efficient cardio and muscle-toning workout. It includes textured pedals, padded hand grips, ergonomic handlebars, and a cushioned seat and backrest. Extra features help drive performance, including the multi-function LCD monitor, which tracks workout time, distance traveled, calories burned and speed. The adjustable resistance dial allows you to change up your intensity level on-the-fly. 
Foldable Fitness Bike 
Engage your core and legs with this foldable workout bike that offers adjustable bike workout intensity. The Wonder bike has a folding frame and built-in wheels for easy storage. 
Experience connected fitness with this home gym equipment with the müüv app. With smart guided coaching, exercise demo videos, personalized workouts, assembly videos, and more, müüv provides the best workout and fitness experience with your Stamina equipment. Download the müüv app on the Apple App Store or the Google Play store.

title: Sunny Health & Fitness Indoor Stationary Cycling Exercise Bike for Home Cardio Workout, 4-Way Adjustable & Cushioned Seat, Optional Magnetic Resistance & Free Exclusive SunnyFit App Bluetooth Link
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Exercise Bikes
description: Effective, Durable and Comfortable are the three main advantages of Sunny Health and Fitness SF-B1203 Chain Drive Indoor Cycling Bike. Starts pedaling towards fitness with the stationary bike that offers a smooth, quiet and lasting ride every time. Get rid of that stubborn stomach fat and start toning your core muscles and lower body.
features: 【TWO-STAGE TRANSMISSION SYSTEM】This innovative exercise bike deviates from traditional spinning models by incorporating a two-stage movement transmission system, offering enhanced realism, optimized muscle engagement.

【SILENT AND SMOOTH OPERATION】This cycling bike features magnetic resistance and a quiet belt ride, ensuring a silent and smooth ride but also the added benefit of 7 levels of resistance. Users can adjust the resistance to customize their workouts.

【FREE CONNECTED APP】 Enjoy FREE access to the SunnyFit App with every Sunny Health & Fitness product—no membership fees! Dive into 1,000+ trainer-led workouts, explore 10,000+ virtual scenic tours, track your progress, challenge others, and much more!

【EMERGENCY BRAKE】The 7-level resistance lever can function as an emergency brake when fully depressed. This design enables swift adjustments and precise control over the flywheel, allowing users to instantly stop their workout in case of emergency.

【TRACK YOUR PROGRESS】The upright bike is equipped with a user-friendly LCD monitor displaying metrics, time, speed, distance, calories, pulse, and RPM. This tracking system provides real-time feedback, enabling users to monitor their progress.

【CUSTOMIZED COMFORT】Featuring a 4-way adjustable seat and 2-way adjustable handlebars, this exercise bike offers comfort and adaptability. Users can personalize their riding experience by adjusting the seat and handlebars, ensuring the perfect fit.

【CONVENIENT ALL-IN-ONE DESIGN】This exercise bike offers ultimate convenience with its built-in device holder for entertainment, a water bottle holder for hydration, and a dedicated space for dumbbells, allowing users to stay connected.

【INTEGRATED PULSE SENSORS】It features integrated pulse sensors that provide real-time heart rate data. You can optimize your workout intensity, ensuring a safe and effective cardiovascular session tailored to your fitness goals.

【STURDY AND EASY ASSEMBLE】This bike boasts a solid 265 LB weight capacity, making it suitable for a wide range of users. It is easy to assemble as well as the convenient transportation wheels, ensuring effortless setup and easy storage.

【Sunny Health & Fitness Commitment】A top fitness brand for 20+ years, offers superior products and a dedication to excellence. Count on our committed customer service and trainers for the best fitness experience.

features: INDOOR BIKE TRAINER - Convert any bike with 700cc, 26-inch or 27-inch tires into a bike trainer stand for indoor riding. This bike stand for exercise lets you train on your bicycle all year round.
ADJUSTABLE RESISTANCE - The bicycle stand features a magnetic roller on the rear tire that can be set to the resistance you desire by turning the knob to add or reduce tension against your wheel.

QUICK RELEASE AXLE - This trainer has hubs that fit any bike with a quick release skewer already on their rear tire and comes with a quick release skewer so you can convert any beach, road, or mountain bike's rear axle to fit this trainer.

STABLE AND PORTABLE - This bicycle trainer features extra wide legs and a sturdy frame for maximum stability. The bike stand is also extremely light and can be folded for travel or storage for your convenience.
PRODUCT DETAILS - Materials: Painted Steel, Plastic, Aluminum. Dimensions: (L) 15" x (W) 18.5" x (H) 21.5". Maximum Weight Capacity: 275lbs. Color: Silver.

description: GOREDI Under Desk Bike Pedal Exerciser, Portable Mini Exercise Bike with LCD Display for Home/Office, Desk Cycle for Leg/Arm with Handle, Leg Exerciser While Sitting for Seniors
features: 【HEAVY FLYWHEEL】Unlike ordinary plastic flywheels, this seated pedal exerciser features a heavy metal flywheel to improve stability. An internal 5-pound steel flywheel makes it effortless to use in for a long time, and can bear more than 400 pounds.

title: Alpcour Fluid Bike Trainer Stand for Indoor Riding – Portable Foldable Stainless Steel Trainer, Noise Reduction, Progressive Resistance, Dual-Lock System – Road & Mountain Bikes' Stationary Exercise

features: MAKE THE SWITCH TO STATIONARY! – Fluid bike stand converts any mountain or road bike into a stable, smooth-riding indoor stationary bicycle for all-season training, conditioning, fitness & exercise – A must-have for dedicated cyclists!

NEAR SILENT FLUID TECHNOLOGY – High-quality flywheel mechanism creates drag against back tire to replicate real cycling experience – Built-in super noise reduction eliminates whir, while reduced friction extends the life of your bike

ULTIMATE FAMILY FITNESS GIFT – The ideal gift for every family member: from sons to daughters, fathers to mothers, grandpas to grandmas. Whether it's a special Xmas gift, a treat for granddaughters and grandsons, or just because – make indoor cycling memorable for your loved ones!

title: Sportneer Bike Trainer - Portable Fluid Stationary Bike Stand for Indoor Riding, Bike Trainer Stand with 26-28" & 700C Wheels, Quick Release Lever & Adjustable Rubber Feet, Foldable Storage
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Sports › Cycling › Bike Trainers & Accessories › Resistance Trainers
features: Versatile Compatibility: No more size problem! The Sportneer fluid resistance training stand fits various bike sizes, compatible with road or mountain bikes with 26-28" or 700c wheels and rear wheel axles between 4.33' and 7.87'. (Note: This training stand only comes with a quick release skewer. For a thru-axle bike, you will need to purchase an adapter separately.)

Near-silent Fluid Tech: It's absolutely frustrating to have your neighbor complaining about the thundering noise every time you practice. That's why this bike trainer comes with the built-in super noise reduction feature, eliminating noise and reduce friction for extended lifespan.

Note: The noise level may vary depending on the tire tread pattern-the more the threads, the louder the noise. It's recommended to use a road bike or equip your bike with slick tires. If you have a mountain bike with rough tires and really mind the noise, buy it with caution.

Stable & Safe Structure: Say goodbye to wobbles! Design with stability and safety in mind, we've crafted the triangular support structure from high-carbon steel and ABS, providing a sturdy and secure base for your bike. Better yet, The front wheel pad and adjustable rubber foot pads ensure that your bike stays in place, even on slightly uneven ground, allowing you to exercise with peace of mind.

Indoor Cycling Available: Concerned about the challenges of riding in inclement weather, such as rain, snow, or icy/sunny road conditions? Luckily, the solution couldn't be simpler. With Sportneer fluid-resistant bike trainer, you can have the same outdoor experience when you can't practice outdoors. Now, your home is the unlimited cycling paradise.

Ultra Compact Size: The Sportneer Fluid Indoor Bike Trainer can be assembled and disassembled in just a few short minutes. The frame can be folded to an ultra compact size (only 23*20*9.5 inches) for easier storage.
